玩了九小时全成就通关了，因为瘾比较大还搭配了很久的样板房，如果只推主线的话流程应该是七小时左右，总的来说内容比较少。不过主要原因是因为个人喜欢这类游戏，所以喜欢闷头一直整理过去，如果只是休闲玩的话内容大抵还算充足。然后以下是一些比较不满的和建议的地方。
[b]1.对于简介写的根据选择决定小镇玩家的命运感觉纯为噱头[/b]，事实上没有体验到太真切的这样的感受，游戏的主线和结局给我的感觉也就是噢噢就这的感觉。[strike]当然谁会过分在意一个收纳游戏的剧情呢[/strike]
[b] 2.放置自由度不足。[/b]有的家具碰撞箱做的太大又不能重叠感觉很影响搭配体验，因为个人很喜欢森系风格所以这里最主要要提出的就是墙面装饰绿植。还有样板房和主角自己的屋子，虽说可以更改壁纸地板颜色，但事实上不能随意拖动更改位置，先不论自己拉动墙面地板大小一类的操作，连自由增加减少窗户都做不到，也无法更改窗户样式；楼梯，护栏虽说可以更改样式，但是样式很少，甚至没有取消护栏这个选项，很多时候都给装修带来了更多的麻烦；以及每次随机到有二层样式的样板房都非常苦恼，因为也没有取消二楼地板显示的选项，虽说有透视模式，但是每次放置家具还是觉得仿佛盲人摸象。主线后续给予的房子更是连家具都不能挪动，实在没有觉得这个是属于我的房子。
[b]3.家具分类不够细致。[/b]看了一下大家都在提出这个问题所以就不多聊了，虽说目前有基础的分类但是找起来还是觉得很麻烦，希望能添加更细致的分类。
[b]4.增加可染色家具提示，增加可染色家具提示，增加可染色家具提示。[/b]重要的事情说三遍，建议在可换色家具的图标上添加提示类图标，为了找一个符合风格的柜子桌子每次都得把家具一个一个放出来看能不能换色。
[b]5.增加小地图。[/b]是可有可无的小细节，但是确实感觉也算是一个小困扰的点，在主线完成之后每次找做样板房的地方没有箭头指引，每次按地图又觉得麻烦，虽说后面给了公交车卡减少移动，但我连公交车站都找不到。以及收集全图鉴的时候满地图找商店的时候也是相同的心情。。。
总之个人建议大体就是这五点——大概也有别的地方但是暂时想不起来了。虽然写了这么多不太满意的地方但总之还是瑕不掩瑜。像素风装修收纳类游戏每一点都很喜欢，推荐所有想要放松一下的人购入！

6.5/10，我也好想可以倒转时空啊！
流程偏短，体验顺畅，玩法略显无聊，但美术和小互动+文案加分的小品游戏。

+
1.游戏核心玩法是装修，过关要求不高。有三类：①箱子里所有东西拿出来放进房间即可；②把所有东西放到指定位置即可；③一些小玩法关（找到小猫咪，带走遗物）。游戏的目标很清晰，玩起来很轻松。
2、提供城镇作为关卡之间的衔接内容，过渡时间通过不断放小交互，填充了垃圾时间。小交互有小解密（点击即可），捡垃圾和修水管一类简单玩法加分以升级，npc对话可以获得一些灵感。
3、交互较为流畅，点击、转向，移动时以格子为基础，能很快地放置到需要目标位置。配合匹配物品的音效，体验还可以。而且物品种类足够多，还会分品牌，每个物品有文字描述，摆超市的时候放爽了。
4、故事简单但文字很动人，矫情的程度刚刚好，文案简洁。很喜欢收拾遗物那一关，必须要丢掉一些物品的设定很真实。游戏有挺多小故事关于生死离别的，温情脉脉。

-
1、玩法很无聊，因为没有挑战，隐藏内容也很直给，导致玩起来容易走神。
2、小地图的结构没什么记忆点，容易迷路。在我玩的后期游戏似乎更新了显示屏幕外任务处的指引箭头，这个还可以。
3、内容量很少，小镇很多内容感觉还可以挖掘。以及剧情有点高高举起最后轻轻放下了，建议维持克的世界观，克到底。温馨的克，没有竞品啊！
整个游戏都没有时间限制，随时都可以很随意的在城镇里闲逛、慢慢装修房间，这实在太棒了！！！非常喜欢这种悠闲的游戏！目前感觉游戏主线内容较少，希望后序会有更多内容~

This was a delightful and cute game! I would love to see them add more levels and story! With that being said, the game and all of the achievements can be fully completed in about 5-6 hours, so the price of $15 does feel a little high. But I loved finding all the secrets and little puzzles!

不错的休闲游戏，晚上工作忙完后玩一会很能缓解疲劳，很解压。
很喜欢拍照模式，很多房间都能给人温暖舒适的感觉，能用来当电脑壁纸。
音效和放置物品的手感很不错，家具的小配文很有意思。
非常建议在以后的更新中添加多点家具和剧情，能有创意工坊最好，感觉是很有潜力的一个游戏。
要改进的是目前很多场景互动还比较单一，家具的摆放方向只有四个方向，家具分类也不完善。

个人最喜欢爷爷奶奶两关，和祖辈一起生活过，所以特别能共情爷爷充满生活痕迹的老屋。奶奶也去世了，所以在病房整理白老太的遗物时总是忍不住塞了又塞，将一件件遗物扔在垃圾箱好像抹掉一个人的生活痕迹一样残忍。为逝者“搬家”不是拿出，而是收回，我对着阳光洒落的病床默默发呆了好久。小镇其实保留了微恐元素，只是个人觉得或许情感更具有打动人心的力量，呓语小镇为“装修”赋予了独特的意义，我也从未在其他游戏中只因装修而获得如此复杂的情绪，大多数装修似乎只是游玩游戏本体附赠的一项功能。
      （unpacking除外，致敬unpacking）
      作为一名从内测玩家，我见证了小镇的一路成长。开发者团队会倾听每一条意见，呼声大的第二天甚至当晚就会改好，重新翻看demo时期的玩家反馈表，基本上80%的内容已被满足。其实大家常说的那几点他们都有在改了，只不过一只手数的过来的小工作室出效果比较慢，还请大家耐心等待。虽然呓语小镇还不够成熟，但发售只是一个开始，家具量这些不是一朝一夕就能饱和的，小镇未来还有很长的路，请元气弹工作室一定一定要好好走下去。
---------------以下涉及结局剧透------------------
[spoiler]另外关于结局的解析，我一开始也以为博物馆的档案内容是旧版本的废稿。其实不然，按照官方的说法，是玩家的到来改变了整个小镇的走向，档案只是玩家没来之前角色的既定结局，结合外星人的那段话就很好理解了。
（虽然这个结局真的有点点诡异，建议改成第一次进博物馆，看到旧版本档案→和外星人对话→走出房间，档案被改写，这样就好理解多了）[/spoiler]
无敌！！！！自unpacked开创整理收纳游戏流派后，青出于蓝而胜于蓝，这作简直是unpacked max plus！！！！不仅体量大很多，所有的细节、解密要素和菜单都既温馨又有情趣，感觉制作组都是十分有趣有品的人！！！感谢你们做出这么好的游戏！！！

The last time I kept so up to date with so much excitement before a game release was probably Bear and Breakfast - I literally hopped on as soon as it dropped and didn't put it down until I'd finished - I'm still working on finishing up the achievements but game play wise this game is incredibly fun, it's like if stardew and unpacking had a baby. The game environment is interactive and engaging, there's a lot of room for creativity outside of the games mystery with multiple properties to decorate with a very large library of items to collect and the puzzles are challenging but not difficult. Although I know the game is new, I do hope there is more content added - it has such a comforting vibe it's a shame its such a short game, the story was fun but that too was very short winded but i'd imagine in future more depth will be added (or at least that's what im hoping). Overall super cute game, i'd definitely recommend to players looking for something to just delve into for a few hours!

I played for about four hours and I feel like I've barely made a dent in this game. If you rush through it and slap down whatever furniture you find then yes, you'll get through it quickly. But if you play it for all it's worth, including exploring the town, meeting characters, finding secrets, completing each job to 100%, you'll end up like me. It starts out playing a bit like Unpacking, placing furniture in a neat and tidy way. Then the story begins and you find yourself searching for hidden clues and secrets, finding hidden rooms and solving mysteries. There's even jobs where you can design your own room based on a clients needs. 

The art is top notch, and for someone with the eyesight of a bat, I'm incredibly grateful that hovering over each item gives it a description so I'm not staring at pixels unsure of what it is. The story is fun, the decorations are adorable and I love the diversity of jobs given. Top notch game.

特别特别好玩！！！！非常好玩又可爱的像素风游戏~
优点：1.细节满满，让人很想慢慢的品味，每个家具都有可爱的介绍。2.不是单纯的装修，主线剧情有解密、收纳、细思鼻孔的部分很有意思不会疲劳。3.画风和音效都是极致的享受，就是一种恰到好处的爽感（就是一张脸眼睛就该在这鼻子就该在那的感觉谁懂？）4.游戏内的拍照功能很好，自带滤镜贴纸系统，可以自己DIY照片直出~（爱做手帐的人有福咯）
缺点：1.主线流程过快，玩的快的人很快就玩完了，可以添加一些延长游戏寿命的部分。抱着仔细体会又舍不得玩的心态玩了两个半天就玩完了。2.目前来说卧室的床铺和卫浴、窗帘部分的可用品类很少，希望后续能多出一点。
总体上是非常好玩的游戏，在细节上给人的惊喜和带来的愉悦感受让这个价位也觉得很值。
游戏嘛快乐最重要~

Whisper Town invites you into a cozy, heartwarming world where decorating, organizing, and uncovering little stories come together in a delightful experience. Taking on the role of the town’s versatile housekeeper, you’ll dive into a variety of charming and quirky tasks. From moving into new homes and tidying up cluttered spaces to setting up fresh shops, sorting through cherished keepsakes, and even tracking down elusive cats, every task offers a sense of purpose and reward. Completing these jobs grants you new furniture and decorative items, giving you the freedom to create a space that truly reflects your style and personality.

As you help the townsfolk bring order to their lives, you’ll begin to notice that your efforts do more than just tidy rooms—they gently influence the lives and stories of the residents around you. Beneath the surface of this quaint town lies a collection of unusual secrets waiting to be uncovered. Every item you place, every corner you clean, reveals traces of the people who live there. The small details—a dusty letter, a carefully placed teacup, a plant resting by the window—each holds a quiet story just waiting to be discovered. Yet, Whisper Town isn’t just about neatness; it’s a playful place too. You might find yourself tinkering with a vintage gramophone, squeezing a rubber duck, or sneaking a tissue from a box, as if the town itself is softly calling out to you through these little gestures.

With over 1,800 pieces of furniture and more than ten unique home layouts, the game offers endless possibilities for personal expression. Whether you want to line a study wall with towering bookshelves, fill a sunlit greenhouse with flourishing plants, or stock a doomsday shelter full of supplies, the choices are yours to make. Customization goes beyond just placement—wallpapers, flooring, and many pieces of furniture can be recolored or retextured to perfectly suit your mood. Dozens of items even feature unique sound effects, so as you explore and decorate, you don’t just see your home—you hear it come alive. Tap the drums, snap a photo, or run the tap to fully immerse yourself in the environment.

Spending time with the townsfolk deepens your connections and builds friendships, enriching the warmth of everyday moments. Yet, beneath the cozy surface, Whisper Town holds mysteries that hint at something more enigmatic. A flickering number—42—hovers above the museum. A sudden rainbow streaks the sky. Rumors swirl about a “heart-stealing ghost” haunting the old well, and strange tentacles seem to creep from cracks in the town’s foundations. These eerie signs suggest that the town’s story is far from ordinary, and perhaps the one destined to uncover its hidden truths is you. Whisper Town balances the charm of simple, heartfelt living with whispers of deeper mysteries, inviting you to explore, create, and unravel its secrets at your own pace.

Rating: 9/10
LOVE THIS GAME

What starts as a simple task of unpacking and arranging items in [i]Whisper of the House[/i] quickly unfolds into something much deeper. The core loop feels similar to [i]Unpacking[/i]—you’re given a room and a set of belongings to organize. Sometimes there are specific requirements, and other times you’re free to get creative and place things however you like.

What really sets it apart, though, are the stories woven into the gameplay. One moment you’re helping a new neighbor move in, and the next you’re uncovering strange, occult secrets hidden around town. The mix of wholesome slice-of-life with a touch of mystery makes it hard to stop playing. Additionally, it allows for an incredible amount of creativity, while still being a task driven game, unlike similar sandbox style games.

I love that you can decorate your own house too, unlocking new items as you go. Items can be rotated, recolored, and even interact with each other—like putting sheets on a bed or stacking plates neatly in the cupboard. It’s a small detail, but it makes everything feel more alive.

It’s incredibly cozy, oddly addicting, and I keep telling myself “just one more room” before realizing I’ve been playing for hours. If you enjoyed [i]Unpacking[/i] or just want a relaxing decorating game with an engaging story, this one is absolutely worth it.

I rarely leave reviews, but this game really was something!

The story is well written and rather long, there's atleast 8-10 hours worth of story gameplay, and the rest can be used to re-decorate or decorate your own houses, it's a very lovely game and it had a few surprises up it's sleeve! 

I highly recommend getting it, but please note that the story doesn't last forever, and to truly enjoy it try take it at a slower pace, instead of cramming through the entire story in 1-2 days like I did.

It does feel a bit lacking in some areas, such as options when it comes to decorating your own home, interacting with people and so forth, but nothing too limiting. 

I do also wish you were able to fully customize your character, rather than having to pick between a blonde boy or a black haired girl, and being able to actually own a pet, after seeing so many of them in the game.

It's definitely a good game for those who want to sit back and relax and just organize things though!

I already have 23 hours of this game and can't see myself getting sick of it anytime soon. I read a review that claimed it had similar gameplay to Unpacking, and while that's very true, I find this game has 10x more to offer than what Unpacking ever did. Whisper of the House has all the freedom of creativity that I, personally, felt Unpacking heavily lacked. It's plot puts you in the perspective of a housekeeper that can clean, organize, and decorate the spaces your clients assign to you freely! Not to mention the detail of the decor is absolutely outstanding. If you're a huge fan of the Sims, House Flipper 1 or 2, or Stardew Valley, I highly recommend Whisper of the House! Little hint: there is far more than meets the eye to what seems like a typical decorating space game. I adore when wholesome games throw in a bit of something more eerie to keep the player invested, and Whisper of the House does exactly that! I'm incredibly excited to see what's in store for the future of this game!!

现在能玩到一款玩法简单但是又制作扎实的游戏是真的不容易。
本以为只是类似动森DLC那样不断布置房间的玩法，但是没想到还有相当多的收集解密元素，甚至有做菜环节。
剧情流程不长，四个小时就通关了，意犹未尽。
希望未来可以持续更新新内容或DLC。

缺点的话，我觉得内容量目前还是可以的，毕竟本来就是为了这方面玩法专门做的游戏，能无限让你布置装修就很不错。
- 然后我认为除了主线故事以外 支线任务缺少动森DLC中那种反馈，装修完房子甚至连一个回复都收不到就显得很没成就感，与其说是为NPC布置，体感上更像是无限布置自己的房子一样。
- 希望收集要素，比如种花、烹饪这方面能有更多内容。
- 希望玩家角色也能够和NPC一样在房子里走动或出现，这样拍照的时候就不只是空空的房间了。
- 仓库菜单仍然不是非常直观，如果可以依照主题或色系分类更好。
- 路人NPC希望能有更多的互动，甚至现在对话就只有那么几句。

总的来说如果内容量可以再大一些，细节再打磨打磨，这游戏几乎是养老向游戏最完美的选择之一。

这款游戏我从很早之前就蹲了，最终成品和我想的差不太多，于是也果断购入并基本体验了全流程。首先原价买是比较亏的，因为主线流程太短，并且删了很多早期测试阶段的暗线，真的很可惜，导致相较于早期demo显得温馨有余而深度不足，我的建议是继续决定铺设暗线那就把它做好。不过据说会继续更新，那我也很期待，后续更新新内容还会继续游玩的。其次是自由装修的地方，抽盲盒显得很臃肿，分类又不够明确，需要优化，但是我自己装修得很爽很幸福，总得来说虽然有点小贵但是体验感不错，愿意花这个钱~犹豫的玩家也可以考虑等以后蹲打折或者等主线继续更新呢，和unpacking是没办法互相替代的~

作为这个价位的游戏，我认为主创团队仍需认真打磨。
首先说一下元素。最初买下这款游戏，吸引我的有这几个元素：像素房间设计、沙盒、清日常。进入之后发现实际上还有：抽卡收集、主线故事、彩蛋，附属功能玩法。
值得一提的是附属功能玩法，比如中间的烤箱、纸箱打包、炼药、调酒等，这些功能性的交互让我觉得很有意思。
不太认同的部分有：
1.[b]时间系统[/b]：看得出来有这几种考虑，主世界（小镇）时间季节流动，进入副本（任务房间）后时间照常流动，睡觉过天系统。在这么快的时间流速下，前两点就导致了第三点基本上毫无作用，每晚做完任务，再到外面逛逛，就可以收邮件领新任务了，根本没停。所以其实这三点就形成了不可能三角。
2.[b]室内人物[/b]：可以看到游戏专门在主世界摆了很多可以坐下的长凳（3A大作梗），既然这样，为什么房间内反而不能控制人物进行交互，还可以催生过家家、走迷宫等各种玩法。现在的交互更像是unpacking这类游戏的点击模式，只能说这一块真的太遗憾了。
3.[b]装饰玩家社群建设[/b]：游戏里有很多不同主题的家具，其实对装饰玩家来说需要有一定的收集度，但是收集的因素靠抽卡（虽然体验下来对于未抽到的部分可能有一定的概率加成，而且钱也管够，没有让我卡在最后几个物品上）。玩家可以领日常委托，但是日常委托的检测形同虚设，随便摆几个家具就可以通过。至少应该给各类家具增加一些隐藏的tag，然后检测这类家具的出现次数，判断这个房间是否符合要求的主题，这一点技术上应该可以实现，只是需要足够细节。另外呢，现在视频社交平台可以看到有人发自己做得房间很好看，也有一定的交流。所以我非常遗憾游戏没有能内嵌一个互相评分的系统，可以点击进入别人设计的房间并且评分，达到多少评分可以得到额外的奖励。
此外呢，主线故事有点贪多贪全，然后用一个完成美梦的外星人来串联，每个留下的印象不太深刻。加上节奏接二连三让人玩着玩着只想快点过了主线进入后面自由发挥的阶段。玩到后面就是感觉这个游戏也就贵在家具体量上了，但真要谈体量，自由上色家具、一些类型（如果蔬、名画、可晾挂服装、床上用品等）是不是还有更多扩展的可能？总之就是30-60区间价格的游戏，我会报有更大的期待。期待游戏会更新

Recommended for Non-Cozy Players as well. Not only does it has Secrets and Story, i just love that it actually tells you things you could do. You have actual "Quests" which for those kind of things where you decorate your room is usually not that common. And i'm not one of those Sims players that like to create things for no reason, i sadly need that small part of "hey can you help me move in" or "redecorate the house, a friend is joining me".

You also have a whole town to explore and walk around and furnitures to collect that you can freely place in your homes, which is more of the Sims direction i would say where you are free to do whatever you want to do.

So if you not the biggest creator and creative guy, i still recommend this one above a lot of others simply because it features the quests, town to explore and so much more. Also it is freaking 15€ max, that's a steal, just sayin not only for all the coding necessary to make it work so smooth but also for all the pixelart that comes with it.

非常值得一玩的治愈系像素风游戏。不仅是为游戏角色装修家居，更是为自己搭建梦想。
游戏整体流程不是很长，但细节丰富，从小物件的彩蛋到每个角色的生活都勾勒出了一个栩栩如生的温馨小镇。
搭配上捡垃圾、收集图鉴和装点样板房的玩法，即使是主线流程完成之后依然有很高的可玩性，非常适合想要休闲放松的玩家。

但游戏本身还有一些缺点，例如小镇上遇到的NPC对话内容空洞且固定，物品旋转只有四向甚至有些只有两向。后续希望能丰富小镇角色的对话，增加主线流程，以及支持更精细的物品旋转功能。

画风很可爱，也好玩，很多风格店铺可以装修，有的互动点还挺惊喜的，最喜欢炼金工坊那个房间，有点神秘学了，找草药炼制魔药的小彩蛋太有意思了，感觉微恐元素占比不是很高，最高的估计就是装修墓地去阁楼那里，阁楼上也不多设置几个小高能，还是太谨慎，然后感觉物品的数量也有点不合理，有的小物件有注释，有的又没有。相比于价格，流程还是偏短了，垃圾桶是捡不出好东西的，摸路边猫猫是不能带回家的，希望互动点能更多一些，房间装修完就是完了，除了第二次进就没有更多的剧情。不过其实收集完所有异常就能算通关了吧…后面通关时还有小镇规则怪谈哈哈。然后虽然家具绿植杂货很多，但是都不好搭，尤其是书籍，出那么多种差不多的有啥用，还不如出个主题套组，家具太散装零碎了以至于在仓库很难找，时常找不到要用的家具。说这么多小不足，不过总的来说还是值得一玩的。

内容太少了，不仅是剧情，房型、家具种类、可互动建筑都太少，地图空空的，比如地毯店旁边的车，很适合做店铺或者剧情的类地标竟然只能戳一下。无论是盲盒还是图鉴能不能做个收集度的百分比条有时候以为抽全了但是差一个，因为UI做的不明显又分不清那是黑色家具还是没抽出来的，盲盒比较有创意但是没有做出盲盒的精髓，纯疲惫式抽家具，要不咱们把基础家具直接售卖，盲盒做成真盲盒，分成几个主题盲盒，内容是一些特别有设计的家居套装（不限制家具个数），这样代金券也有地方花了也不至于后期盲盒店无人光顾。说到家具就要说到食物盲盒，后边家具都能买了为什么食物还是要抽，那个811和面包店可以卖点东西吗，不装修的时候连个路人都没有真有点灵异了，NPC就纯NPC点击就说一自以为很玄的话，沙滩上那姐大半夜晒太阳但是下雨了又有人知道打伞，镇上总想突出一些克苏鲁和灵异感实则像咖啡店里卖空调一样突兀，没有合理的世界观设定显得很多《特色》充满了不和谐和元素堆砌感。镜头移动很痛苦，人一动场景跟人一样快速移动，人一停场景点刹我已经晕车到胃部蠕动，作者有多观察现实吗没观察过可以借鉴星露谷，糟糕的体验导致我不会探索小镇太多，即使使用了鼠标移动但是因为以上问题：人和场景黏在一起像瓷砖上打香皂了一样快速出溜，就不会在路上多闲逛一会。然后是文案相关问题，肉眼可见的文学素养高中水平，背景交代的不好，世界观设定的不完整，显得文案很想咖啡店售卖的空调，文案的表达水平(讲话方式、语言节奏等等)该提高了，大家讲话的时候没感觉到他们是那个场景中的人，创新的前提是日常能够做到还原日常，诡异的事起码在地球上都是基于日常发生的
解谜好像是游戏的卖点之一，但是这个引导、暗示、逻辑性都不够，你可以是个简单的推理解谜，但是目前做的像缺胳膊少腿的盲猜游戏，科学哥的剧情去爷爷家打扫一圈就没了，回来还以为有什么剧情结果就没了，给爷爷打扫的设计是有点意思的但是做的没头没尾，露娜的小屋，进到小隔间里为啥不让拿着蜡烛，敲缝隙又是因为什么里面有魔法鬼怪克苏鲁吗一样都没有吧，进去盲摸也摸不出来啥特殊道具，明明能手持家具穿梭在每个屋子，就不能设计成露娜在上个出租屋用剩下的一段蜡烛一直不知道放哪所以第二次进她家主角在发现缝隙以后去客厅拿蜡烛顺便告诉她一声再进到隔间里吗，没有跟房东的扯皮吗房东消失术？不要说因为一些内测玩家才导致的你们修修改改最后剧情如此萎缩，改就往好了改就往逻辑通畅了改，也别什么都用小镇有魔法来敷衍逻辑漏洞，，主角看到缝隙连说都不说一声黑灯瞎火自己钻进去了？？？为什么。进去以后也不能和露娜对话或者打电话告诉她她家里有个隔间，进去转一圈出来了我也不知道我该干什么，只能把隔间里的东西搬出来过两天露娜自己发现那些东西，为什么，为什么不能直接说，她们不是有联系方式吗，为什么要我把东西搬出来但是这又不是个打扫的任务。剧情经常一块出现好几个做的乱七八糟的，这是主线是不是应该流畅一些，给人的感觉是做了一堆支线然后分析一堆逻辑不通看起来迷之玄学的话然后就没了....
然后说到玩的最久的装修环节，装修给七分，喜欢里边对日用品之类的的细致分类，卫生巾、护垫、助行器、各种牌子的洗发水。没装好的屋子可以再修修改改，颜色搭配也挺好看的。建议家具分类阳间一点，即使有三个筛选栏我也没办法快速找到床和床垫，除了生活用品牌子多以外衣服、衣架、桌子款式啥的是不是也可以增加一些设计、数量、色彩呢，感觉美术这里会更抠细节一些于是就忘掉了大关系才是最重要的，三张桌子长得一样细节不同的前提是有更多的桌子的立体构成不一样，其下的分支才是差不多的桌子不同的颜色和细节，这才是用心做游戏。整个游戏的大框架都蛮差的（。）细节又有在认真的扣，难评。装修那一块用的很痛苦，没有批量改颜色，理想家的房型都确定下来了为啥就不能捆绑一下做个批量上色的选择，改颜色右手边和地下的墙、地板经常被色板挡住挪也挪不开，建议让我挪走因为我看不见效果了，色板希望能改成拾色器颜色太纯了容易不好看，谁家墙哇绿哇绿的把家具都要晃没了。然后希望理想家的主题能多出点相关家具，总体的种类还是太少了，要么主题屋做都做不全，要么两个房同样的主题几乎装得一模一样，房型也可以多出一点，窗户设置可以删除好吗或者多来几种窗帘，我不希望实验室锃明瓦亮的阳光直射烧杯量瓶，现在理想家的默认墙和地板很像是随机生成的，主题就那几个，玩着玩着就没内容了。还有宠物相关的东西有一点点少，我想在家养各种品种的狗你们能不能开个宠物店啊卖点宠物的各种用品，现在连个猫砂盆都没有养猫怎么可以没有猫砂盆和开盖废纸箱，理想家也可以放在一些没开放的门市房里这样就可以装修宠物店、咖啡店啥的了，再然后再再再再多出点家具吧主题家具的种类和数量真的不够
总体48还是贵了看看隔壁星露谷那么多东西才定价四十多，如果这是个装修游戏请认真开发装修相关事项，让用户有个良好的装修体验，目前为止给美术和音乐点赞，这俩能值二十，剩下28如同打水漂

Posting this for my wife since she played the game via Steam Family Sharing:

Going out of my way to post this review because that’s how much I loved this game!

It feels like the game Unpacking on steroids. Not only do you get to design rooms, but there’s also an active story to follow, a city to clean up, and even a small mystery to solve. I took my time and ended up playing for about 13 hours. Don’t get me wrong, you could probably rush through it in under 2 hours, but the whole point of the game is to decorate, enjoy yourself, and not just fulfill requests as quickly as possible.

It’s the perfect balance: enough gameplay to stay relaxing without ever becoming boring. You can also keep playing after finishing the story, since the notification board updates with new design jobs every day.

PLEASE add more gameplay and objects in the future to give it more of a reason to play after finishing the story, because this really has the potential to become one of my most favorite games of all time.

You have moved to a new town. There you help out by helping your neighbors unpack, clean and organize their homes and/or businesses. You also clean up the town, rummage through the bins for goodies, which can be used to decorate or recycle (for vouchers), There are basic puzzles to solve, hidden areas, and a story with a mystery. Here are the Pros and Cons:

[*] Lots of furniture and items

[b][u] ✧ Cons ✧ [/u][/b]

In conclusion, I give the score of [b]8/10[/b] and I [b]recommend[/b] this game.
Do not hesitate to comment my review down below 🌠

- Frizouw

I’ve been waiting two months for [i]Whisper of the House[/i], and it did not disappoint! The game carries the gentle spirit of Unpacking, yet offers something more personal—an invitation to decorate and shape your own home in a warm, pixelated world. I played the demo before release, and they've come a long way in optimizing the game play; mechanics are smoother and more polished, but I feel like there's room for improvement!

[h3] PRAISES [/h3]
♡ The bulletin board offers replay-ability with the extra rooms to decorate. So after you've completed the main story, you can still get more challenges and a space to continue designing.
♡ My personal favorite is its sound design. The soundtracks create an atmosphere of a soft setting the perfect tone for cozy evenings.
♡ The movement when exploring the map is butter smooth. The whole map hopping from place to place looting trash cans and petting cats is always a fun idle thing to do!

[h3] IMPROVEMENTS [/h3]
♡ I found unlocking Luna’s second quest was unexpectedly tricky—its hint to trigger the next storyline is buried in a skippable line of dialogue. A clearer hint, or a way to revisit key information [spoiler](much like the secret notes in the alchemy questline)[/spoiler], could keep players from losing the thread of the story. This make me skip unlocking [spoiler] achievements [i] It Takes Two, Double Bed, [/i] and [i] territory expansion [/i] blocked. It's skippable and I was able to finish the game without needing to complete it. [/spoiler]
♡ I also wish for more freedom in customization. Recoloring feels a little scattered: some items can be repainted, others come locked in shop-specific colors (e.g. there's a blue swivel chair and an orange recolor in the shop that's two items), while some cannot be changed at all. A more streamlined system could make creativity flow as effortlessly as the gameplay.
♡ There's minor translation slips where Chinese sentences remain untranslated, though they’re small bumps in an otherwise immersive experience.

Despite these details, [i] Whisper of the House [/i] shines with a retro-cozy charm. It leaves me wanting more—more furniture, more storylines, more chances to revisit this gentle world! For now, it may feel short, but I'm sure it will welcome us back with more updates and more cozy moments.

想象中会是很类似Unpacking的作品，但实际要饱满很多——比起伴随一个人的成长历程，这里能看到一些居民群像的影子，并且彼此是有一定呼应的。
赛博整理房间癖好大！满！足！，同时发现了自己对于强设计（比如不给任何要求/限制/主题，而是给我一整个空房间让我自由发挥）确实没有很高的动力，[strike]毕竟初中玩模拟人生的时候，我的小人全程就住在一个清水房里，随便甩了一点家具能吃喝拉撒睡就行[/strike]。但这个游戏真的有试图满足各种放置/整理的xp，居民们的主线任务包括但不限于打扫/放置有限的物品/给出模板一件件摆好/强主题的一系列房间整理……甚至还有支线当中的一系列主题布置，果然游戏的魅力来源于限制（我知道不只是，不一定，[strike]但是没办法就是喜欢被限制[/strike]）

一些小小的解密/神秘要素也算是恰到好处，毕竟看起来没有想把解密作为主线。

走在路上随处都有猫摸的小镇到底是谁在住啊qwq

杀我别用[spoiler]小猫刀！玩到医院那一段剧情的时候，确实一边被刀一边惊艳了一下，虽然本身算不上多么新奇，也不是完全想不到的设定，但是“收拾病房的遗物并且只有一个小平台的空间可以打包带走东西，剩下的全要丢掉。甚至还有很多小猫的食物，玩具，纸箱子；甚至在试图收走逝者的衣物时还有小猫窜出来捣乱不让我动它们”，我真的当场一个旋转流泪爆哭 [/spoiler]，虽被杀，但还是很爱

wew approved? OMG YES!!! (cute pets alert! - you can pat the cats, I repeat, YOU CAN PAT THE CATTOS)

Whisper of the House is a cozy organisation and decorating simulation game with cute and vibrant pixel art. The game takes place in a nice little town near the ocean and filled with greeneries. Although, there seems to be some weird stuff happening here and there (˵ ¬ᴗ¬˵).

I find the story pretty interesting, but I have to point out that the translation is not 100% the best. The english translation is at best at an understandable level, but some mistakes can still easily be noticed by fluent english speakers. Not to mention, I find the story tad bit short (took me 10hours to 100% the game, and that includes me exploring every corner and taking a lot of time trying to decorate my own home). I hope it's because they just released not long ago, so they're still working on expanding the story or some sort.

That's honestly some of the cons I've noticed. Personally I don't mind it much because the decorating aspect of the game remains wide and flexible to the players (except certain areas as part of the story). Moreover, the OSTs in this game is very relaxing, making my playtime fairly enjoyable ദ്ദി ˉ͈̀꒳ˉ͈́ )✧. I'd give this game an 8/10 for now until we get more potential updates (very hopeful here!).

Also, it really scratched that itch of wanting "more" from the Unpacking game (yes, they are very similar! so, do get this game if you enjoyed Unpacking very much).

PS: I played the game on my Steam Deck and personally, I think it runs fairly well. Although, please do take note that it is not 100% compatible, so there are certain issues such as needing to use the touch screen from time to time and also the text being too small in certain areas. I have to admit the game is definitely better on PC since it's more point and clicky rather than a console game, but I'm lazy and I prefer to play on my bed.
可爱，好玩，就是有点太短了，地图上好像还有未开放的地区，还有章鱼手手也没见到，期待后续

之前玩过其他收纳整理类游戏，到最后都会没耐心，导致根本无心去摆放家具。
但是这款游戏让我第一次去思考怎么让我的小家更好看哈哈……

优点：
•主线穿插悬疑解谜要素，不枯燥
•很多家具有交互
•自由度很高，不用担心东西没地方摆
•人物对话简单易懂，点到即止，不会觉得剧情太长
•错过了成就点可以最后回去再弄，不用害怕过了就没法完成（很重要）
•家具（道具）数量十分庞大，成套的主题也很多


改进点：
•主线偏短，打工人用周末的七八个小时就能走完
•家具分类太粗糙，有时候找洗手间的家具要找好久，建议可以像模拟人生那样按照房间功能分类
•家具盲盒最大只能抽10连，几万代金券抽到手断眼瞎

[h1] ถ้าคุณชอบเกมจัดของเเต่งห้อง เกมนี้คือคำตอบ [/h1]

เห็นเกมนี้ออกมาได้สักพักเเล้วเพิ่งมีโอกาสได้ลองเล่นดู โดยที่เกมนี้เป็นเกมที่เรารับบทเป็นตัวละคนตัวหนึ่งที่ต้องไปคอยช่วยเหลือผู้คนในเมือง โดยการจัดระเบียบสิ่งของต่างๆให้สวยงามเรียบร้อย โดยตัวเกมเล่นง่ายมีระบบสอนผู้เล่นใหม่ เกมไม่ต้องทำอะไรมาก ผู้คนจะบอกเราว่าเราต้องทำอะไรบ้างให้พวกเขา อย่างเช่น เช็ดสิ่งสกปรก ทิ้งขยะ วางของบนหิ้งให้เรียบร้อย ไม่ต้องใช้ความคิดเยอะ เเต่งได้ตามสบายใจเราได้เลยไม่มีผิด ส่วนใครที่เล่นไปสักพักเเล้วรู้สึกยากเพราะหาจุดที่ต้องทำไม่เจอหรือทำไมจัดเเล้วไม่ผ่านเควส ตัวเกมมีคำใบ้ช่วยให้ผ่านได้ง่ายขึ้น

นอกจากเเต่งให้คนในเมืองเเล้ว เรายังมีห้องเป็นของตัวเองให้ผู้เล่นสามารถจินตนาการเเต่งห้องได้อย่างเต็มที่ เเถมของตกเเต่งเยอะมาก เป็นร้อยๆชิ้น เเอบตกใจไม่คาดหวังว่าเกมราคาเท่านี้จะเล่นเพลินๆได้ตลอด โดยของตกเเต่งจะได้จากการที่เราได้ตั๋วจากการทำเควสไปเเลกซื้อตามร้านขายของต่างๆทั่วเมืองที่เราอยู่ เกมไม่ได้โฟกัสที่เเต่งห้องอย่างเดียว เรายังสามารถปฏิสัมพันธ์กับสิ่งเเวดล้อมภายในเมืองได้ด้วย เเถมสามารถลูบหัวน้องเเมวได้ !

ตอนนี้ยังเล่นไม่ได้นานเลยยังรีวิวอะไรไม่ได้มากเเต่โดยรวมเเล้ว ราคาเปิดตัวไม่ถึง 300 บาท ซื้อเถอะครับถ้าคุณชอบเล่นเกมเเนวนี้เป็นทุนเดิมอยู่เเล้ว ไม่ผิดหวังเเน่นอนครับ

整体不错，思路很好，但是内容有点少。后续还会继续增加吧，不然有点不值，感觉内容多一倍就满意了。互动做的还可以但类似塔罗牌，翻开就没了，完全看不懂有什么意义。而且，想要主线，主线太短。频繁整理其实很累的，后续的公告板任务都不是很想做，因为没有剧情。
PS：有个BUG没人提吗，就是收到的报纸，我想打开图鉴再看一次信息，但很多都打不开，点了没反应。导致很多信息我瞄了一眼手贱点出去就再看不到了。医院老鼠洞我点了之后跟我说了句啥我至今都没看清……

整理、收纳，装点不同风格的屋子，体验有趣的剧情——不仅仅是画风可爱的一款休闲游戏！有太多令人眼前一亮的设计，虽说流程不长，但静下心去体会那些穿插在委托中的解谜时，能让我深深感受到制作组的用心与热爱。
其中，游戏里的各种meta元素也相当有趣，我是家政公司的优秀员工，同时也是注视着整个小镇的高维生物。就不剧透太多了！总而言之——如果你是被画风和玩法吸引进来的，别犹豫，买它！

才玩了两个多小时，但是迫不及待给好评！世界真的需要更多像呓语小镇还有unpacking这种类型的游戏啊！对上了我这种在现实中懒得收拾屋子，游戏中却乐此不疲的人的电波。很符合我的胃口，都不太舍得玩了（🥹害怕会结束 ）每次看到小屋被收拾得整整齐齐都会有满足感和爽感。                                                                                                                                        优点：1.这款游戏对比unpacking，对于物品的摆放没有特别多要求，玩家能根据自己的习惯更自由摆放物品，还会很贴心的展示每个物品的功能和名称（在物品提示中也有很多幽默的梗哈哈，心领神会了），不会有unpacking那种因为不知道是什么东西来回尝试的抓狂感了。2.故事设置在小镇里，不同的人物登场，之间还会有关联。小镇有很多建筑物，给了玩家更多探索的空间，有很多情节和彩蛋都会在你探索的过程中一点点发现。3.更让人惊喜的是，还包含了恐怖（？）元素，平静的小镇透露出淡淡的诡异感，总觉得背后会有阴谋。4.像素画风和美工真的好看很治愈，喜欢！                                                                                                                    改进：1.希望能像双点医院那样可以转换视角看房间                                                                            2.我们需要更多的内容啊啊啊啊啊！

"언패킹"을 좋아했다면 아트부터 정리 방식까지 전부 친숙하고 취향에 잘 맞을 게임이며, 의외로 차별화 된 부분도 많습니다.

마을의 인테리어 담당자가 되어 다양한 테마의 가게들과 주민들의 집을 정리해 줄 수 있습니다. 초반에는 짐을 풀며 나오는 물건들의 자리를 잡아 주는 데 그치지만, 진행하면서 등장하는 새 장소들에서는 요구사항이 다르거나 퍼즐을 풀어야 하는 상황이 점차 늘어납니다. 상호작용이 가능한 아이템이 매우 많고, 기발한 방식으로 도전 과제로 연결되는 부분도 많아 하나하나 살피는 재미도 좋더라고요.

보상으로 얻은 바우처로 아이템을 구매해, 여러 채 마련할 수 있는 내 집을 꾸미는 게 엔드 콘텐츠여서 내 집 꾸미기도 질릴 만큼 가능합니다. 기본 콘텐츠가 많지는 않지만, 엔딩을 보기 위해서는 모든 미스터리 현상을 찾아야 하는 것 같고 거의 모든 장소를 살펴야 해서 꽤 꼼꼼히 플레이 해야 합니다. 미스터리 발견 현황은 마을 하단의 박물관에서 확인할 수 있는데, 저는 10개를 남겨 놓은 상태에서 일단락했습니다.

한국어 자막을 지원하지는 않아서 마을의 세세한 사연에 몰입해서 플레이 하기엔 무리가 있지만, 각 임무의 요구사항들은 알아보기 쉽게 되어 있고 복잡한 것들이 없는 편입니다.

特别好

面白かったので2周クリア、実績全解除済み

unpacking のような片付けゲーかと思いきや、街を掃除したりゴミ箱を漁ったりしつつ、依頼人の希望通りにインテリアコーディネートをしたり、過去や街に隠されている謎を紐解いていくゲーム。
難しい要素はなく、住人の会話や新聞などを気にかけていればエンディングまで躓くことなく進められます。
凝りすぎなければ5時間前後、配置や家具に拘ると一瞬で時間が溶けていきます。

謎解き要素も不快になるようなものはなく、全体的にカジュアルでありながら、人生経験によってはプレイヤーの心に響くものもあったりと塩梅が大変良いゲームでした。

良かったところ:
◼︎とにかく軽い。現行のPCならほぼ全ての人がプレイできるのではないでしょうか。
◼︎軽いのに部屋や家具のデザインはちゃんとしていて満足感がある。
一部デザインした人が違うな？と感じるものはあっても、全体としては纏まっている。
◼︎謎解きが理不尽ではない。
読み飛ばさなければ必ずピンとくるように作ってあります。
深読みしすぎると詰まりますが、基本的にはスムーズ。
◼︎意外と遊び心のあるギミックが多い。
〇〇がある→これに〇〇を入れたら？〇〇を混ぜたら？〇〇を使ってみたら？など、RPGでインタラクトできる家具や装置を見た時に思ういくつかのことを、実際に試せるものがあります。
実際にできる、ただそれだけで楽しいことを実装してくれることが嬉しい。

残念だったところ:
◼︎家具はそこそこ種類があるのに、ソート機能がそこまで便利ではない。
家具→椅子→床置き、のように絞り込みはあるけれど、全て絞り込めているわけではない。
しかし、キーワード検索では名前にしか反応しない為やはり出てこないものがある。
結果、一覧を延々スクロールしなければ見落としてしまうアイテムが多く出てしまうんです。
自分のプロデュースで部屋を作れる依頼もあるので、このアイテム絞り込み機能の制度を上げてくれると嬉しい。
なので、もっと売れて欲しい！！

I couldn't take my hands off of my keyboard and mouse. 

When I finished the game, I felt EMPTY deep inside. 

I am craving for more, it's scratching a spot I didn't even know existed. I sincerely hope that the devs will come up with a few DLCs or a new entry because I would refresh the store page frantically the day it is released in order to buy it frame 1. 

Thank you for making this game.

你是说想拥有这样一款游戏：它拥有10余种可装修户型、多达1800多件家具可供收集并自由摆放，工作形式多种多样、从普通打扫到找猫猫再到收拾遗物通通涵盖，勤勤恳恳的劳动成果都会得到认可，工作之余还能了解顾客的个人故事，即使不务正业每天搁小镇里溜达溜达还能发掘暗藏的真相？那么，《呓语小镇》绝对包你满意!

《呓语小镇》是一款由元气弹工作室开发并发行的治愈向装修收纳游戏。扮演初来乍到的小小家政工，一步一个脚印成为小镇家喻户晓人人喜爱的明星家政工！但看似井然有序的小镇却有着不少怪异之处，小镇背后隐藏着的会是怎样的真相……？

游戏的玩法也是和同类作品一样简单易上手：按照单主要求收捡打扫房屋、布置物品家具。但与众不同的是，本作加入了一些独特而神秘的要素，让本该简单甚至枯燥的家政工作变得分外有趣起来。比如我们受人之托收拾一位在启动法阵后便神秘失踪的魔法师的家，我们就可以在工作之余调配魔药，过一把魔法师的瘾。虽然我们只是一个小小家政工，但工作地点的那些异象，真的可以置之不理吗……？

如果只能用一个词来形容本作，那么“可爱”与“治愈”的竞争想必会异常激烈。所有的家具都有其对应的简短介（吐）绍（槽），比如普普通通一瓶小酱油：XX酱油，晒足720天，晒这么久还能吃吗哗？再看台式电脑：对有的人来说帧数越高越好，对有的人来说只需要两帧。让人看了不禁会心一笑XD像素画风下呈现的游戏从人物动物再到楼房家具整体风格都显得分外温馨软萌，看得人哈特暖暖🥰

总体而言，《呓语小镇》是一款诚意满满的装修模拟器，绝对算得上是国产独游中的一匹黑马，非常推荐！

Absolutely delightful little game. The pixel artwork is beautiful and the background story is unique and fun without being overbearing. I do wish it was longer as I was having a very very good time and it only took me around 6 hours to 100% complete the game and get all of the achievements. Overall I would recommend it if you enjoy games like Unpacking where the game play is more important than the story. The story is there to just give a little reason for why you're doing what you're doing but it isn't totally necessary. I do still have more items to collect solely for the ability to go around and freely decorate the properties in the game I own but I don't know how much of an incentive that will be for me to go back into the game as the rooms are relatively small and it wouldn't take much time to do so. Solid 4/5 for me. No real reason to replay but I greatly enjoyed my play through and hope for either more content or a follow up game.

so frickin amazing

Pretty much unpacked but open-ish world, pixel graphics and more to it. So far the levels are exactly the same as they were in unpacking (I never finished that game so not 100% sure if it changed from just putting things in a room with a few that had to go in certain spots) but, there has been a couple different "challenges". So far there was one where you could decorate how you see fit, but with a few items that had to be included and another was a music shop that you had to place every items in the exact spot the game wanted you to put them. Then there are some that have you clean up the place as well.

There is a leveling system in place. Only thing I have been given was vouchers. You get them for completing the levels as well and are used for the games gotcha mechanics. You can also find some vouchers in bushes. There are 3 types of gotcha mechanics so far that I have came across. Food, decorations and furniture. It unlocks items for use in your house and for the levels where it allows you to decorate how you set fit.

I can definitely recommend if you are into these types of games.

优点是画风，以及自由度还可以
缺点比较多，一个一个讲
1. 定义不明确
这个是最大的问题，各种地方都能感到作者的不明确。
玩这类装修的追求的更多是治愈感，我希望在这里面看到的是一个一个有趣的单元小故事而不是单纯的没头没尾的小彩蛋，融入克苏鲁的因素但又没有好好地讲好故事，玩完之后感觉作者也没想好这个游戏到底要讲一个什么样的故事。
包括大地图的存在也不太清楚有什么意义，很大的地图，里面没有什么内容，只有几个商店和一些小彩蛋，如果要做大地图就再做一些户外的内容，比如可以装修外面的房屋并在地图上反映出来。但至少现在我觉得大地图只有让玩家走来走去耗时间这一个作用。
作为装修游戏融入收拾房间这一点还不错，但完全按照要求摆家具有点意义不明，获得不了什么成就感，意义不明。
2. bug太多了，优化也不好
3. 房子的布局很奇怪，大部分房间都是奇怪的不对称布局，而且隔断类家具也几乎没有，没有现实感。建议可以多看一下现实中的装修

总结：玩完之后不会留下任何印象深刻的地方的游戏，但画风还不错，对题材感兴趣可以玩

[h1]《呓语小镇》简评[/h1]

在这个小镇里，玩家就是古希腊掌管工作的神，咱们承接着小镇的家政师这一职务，帮助小镇上的居民处理各种家务劳动的活，同时也帮忙负责处理一些异常诡异的事物。眼前的小镇，虽然表面上很温馨、很平和，实际上也确实生活节奏非常的安逸。但是也有一些不一样的存在，科幻、魔幻、诡异、时尚、都市全部都聚集在一起，共同组成了这个不一样的《呓语小镇》。它们是小镇的一部分，也是玩家对于岁月沧桑、物是人非的见证。

[h1]古希腊掌管工作的神[/h1]
玩家的工作，一名家政师。顾客委托玩家一些家政体力活的任务，玩家接取后，前往任务地点，根据顾客的需求（有的顾客需求非常细），认认真真的干完活，结算委托，获得报酬，提升经验。至于具体的工作内容其实很杂，装修房间，布置家居，搬运物品，打扫卫生，收纳物品，以及找到小猫这些事情，只要是杂活，都可以做，有什么做什么，丝毫不嫌弃活脏活累。因此，古希腊掌管工作的神，名至实归。

[h1]强迫症玩家，要被逼疯了[/h1]
虽说玩家的活很多，其实大部分都和房屋有关，比如新建筑的房屋装修、新乔迁的家具布置、旧房子的卫生打扫、破房子的修理翻新……因此，这些工作归根结底，其实就是让房屋变得更好看一些。至于如何好看，这就看玩家的审美和细心了。审美方面，如何在一个狭小的房间里，合理利用空间将全部的家具都布置出来，这个非常的考验玩家布局设计，虽然只要将物品全部摆出来就能拿满分评价，但是一眼就看得出脏乱差的房间，真的不美观。细心方面，主要在于卫生打扫、垃圾收拾、物品收纳，不少内容非常的不显眼，只有仔细观察房间才能观察出端倪。无论是审美布局，还是房屋打扫，一个不美观，一个找不全，让一个强迫症玩家来玩，是真的容易逼疯。

[h1]寻找小镇中不一样的地方[/h1]
整个小镇非常的不一般，即使它的日常生活看着很普通，就是一个寻常的慢节奏生活小镇。科幻、魔幻、诡异、时尚、都市……这些要素在这个小镇上全部都存在的。要知道一个小镇上，有着诸多奇奇怪怪的NPC，例如，成功研发时光机器的科学家，把自己整消失的炼金术师，深海里的神秘水母……要说这是一个普通的小镇，鬼都不信。还别说，真的又诡异。小镇的博物馆突然出现了一个神秘数字，这个数字代表着小镇中当前存在的不寻常超自然现象的数量。玩家的另一项工作，那就是找到这些诡异之处并将它们处理掉，为小镇做家政工作，清理“脏”东西，貌似也没毛病。至于这些诡异，有的在大街上的公共区域，有的在他人的建筑内部，也有的需要一些特殊解密手段，例如，炼金术师的传送门、科学家的时光机器等。总之，这些诡异不是那么容易发现，需要玩家慢慢来。

[h1]家政工作很接地气，对于人生颇有感触[/h1]
《呓语小镇》这款游戏，玩法很悠闲，节奏很舒缓，美术很精致，内容很微妙，这些都是游戏的优点。不过，对于本人来说，游戏最大的特色其实是在做家政工作中，接触到的人、物和事，对于人生非常有感触。例如，医院住院的一位老人去世了，护士委托玩家打扫病房，将老人遗留之物全部都扔掉了垃圾桶，有一只老人喂养的流浪小猫，依旧徘徊在老人已经不在的病房中，还会对扔掉老人外套大衣的玩家非常愤怒。再例如，炼金术师早已失踪不知去向（和某个仪式有关），他的好友委托玩家过来帮忙打扫卫生、收拾房间，希望房间的布局和炼金术师居住的时候一模一样。面对这些生活中的生老病死、聚散离合，不知道为什么，想起了这么一句话——

“人的一生，要死去三次。
第一次，当你的心跳停止，呼吸消逝，你在生物学上被宣告了死亡。
第二次，当你下葬，人们穿着黑衣出席你的葬礼，他们宣告，你在这个社会上不复存在，你悄然离去。
第三次，是这个世界上最后一个记得你的人，把你忘记，于是，你就真正地死去。整个宇宙都将不再和你有关。”

所以，本作之中有着一丝丝淡淡忧桑的旋律，但是却也显得格外美丽，毕竟依旧有人记着已经“不在”的“自己”，也是很好的。

[h1]最后[/h1]
游戏里的家具数量非常之丰富，收集起来相当的费精力和时间，不过，对于图鉴党、收集党玩家而言，这就是快乐。

[quote] 奏游戏之乐章，品人生之绚烂 
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/45672460/]欢迎加入 『 丰川集团 』[/url]
[u][b]以丰川集团之名，行评测鉴赏之事[/b][/u][/quote]

不錯的放置類遊戲，畫風和繪製很舒服舒服，遊戲音樂和音效也非常好，也有不少細緻的場景互動。

按鍵交互的方式有點怪，鍵位設置也不算自由，也不能只用鼠標就完成操作。

地圖的路線比較散亂，人物對障礙物的避讓也很不智能，部分地方的路線很低效，要繞一大段路才可以去到。

戶型不算多，部分戶型不算合理，佈置出來的佈局很怪，部分情況會和室內設計的思路有挺大的衝突。

核心玩法有點不足，很多時會變成在街上重複地和各種場景小物件交互而沒有太多去佈置房間。

終盤內容單調，後期的支線任務很重複，收益很低，結合遊戲的物品管理和倉存系統，沒有讓人認真完成的動力。通關後獲得的能力加成也非常雞肋，對遊玩幾乎不會造成什麼實質性的幫助。

然後非常重要的一個缺點是物件管理非常非常混亂！！場景中物件沒有名稱顯示，而在倉庫和圖鑒頁面里物件排序和分類邏輯也非常混亂。
有庫存數量設計，平時將物件取出或放回倉庫也會影響物件排序，倉庫的查找功能也不太好用，庫存歸零會影響任務中物件的顯示和使用？！
基本上大部分精力就花在物品的管理和補充中。而且倉庫補充也很麻煩，大部分物品只能步行到對應的商店購買，部分類型的物品似乎只有隨機開箱才能補充，很影響任務的執行和日常的管理。綜合商場中各店的位置也很散亂，購物選取時也有點不方便呀。

主題家具好像也並不齊全，似乎不一定能各自湊出一套主題家具的佈置。

正式版好像取消了一些EA版中有爭議性但比較有趣的劇情，不過這個相對不重要了。

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

希望遊戲製作組在之後能完善物品管理和庫存系統，增加更多終盤內容。劇情結束後，除了涉及麻煩的物品管理且收益低的支線任務，基本只剩在遊戲裡點垃圾桶了。
很有意思，收纳类又带着剧情类，值得探索！

Keep in mind, the game itself is very short. The story isn't deep but it has some interesting moments, the scavenger hunt is fun, though the payoff is a little weak.

What this game sets out to do though it does very well. As a dollhouse game it's very successful, I wish there was more more missions and buildings to play around with (not getting to go into the library, farm, lighthouse, or campervan was a bit of a let down) but I think it is overall really solid. I hope theres some updates in the future to add more furniture and missions. I will probably get a few more hours out of this decorating the houses you unlock and re-arranging some of the mission areas.

Such a shame, that a lot of text are in chinese. First it was funny, but it became quickly frustrating that I lose out from story bits because of this. 

I'll return to the game when the developer can confirm that they entierly translated the game.

Such a charming game! Many have compared it to Unpacking, but I also found it more familiar to childhood social mmo's I grew up with, and like a gamified version of custom player rooms you could decorate yourself. I've regularly jumped between the various requests and my own houses to redecorate as I've earned more furniture, and love the variety you get from job to job with what the tasks require. The item descriptions and more mecab secrets have also kept putting a smile on my face for each new one I find!

The only critique I have so far is the controls. I was very excited from the demo that my control does work for play, and for the overall game it functions fine, but it does get pretty glitchy when trying to open up and navigate menues. I frequently have to tab in or out from the game, or click with the mouse for a bit, for the controller to work again. Outside of menues though it works great, and hasn't taken away from the bulk of the game, so I'd love to see this improved in the future!

【游戏整体是好评的，说几个不太好/需要改进的点吧】

1. 游戏体量：体量太小了，整个流程下来包括全成就估计5个小时差不多了，这个体量感觉配不上这个价格（我的游戏时间是因为有挂着出门）
2. 抽家具：这个环节就很让人无语，10个10个抽又很慢，又不能连抽，这种抽的形式又没有什么意义；如果要做这种抽卡形式，建议可以把家具分分稀有度，然后再有个什么闪光家具之类的设定，这样玩家才有抽卡的乐趣和收集的欲望；
3. 自由装修：除了游戏主线的装修内容，教程过了之后根本不用回家，后面送的几个新房也没有想去装修的欲望；建议可以让玩家有点模拟生活的玩法，或者弱联机的玩法，我觉得如果能通过那个高维空间穿越到其他玩家的世界参观就会是一个非常好的设定，甚至可以参考市面上那种模拟类游戏，多放家具可以增加分数，玩家之间可以互相点赞之类的，新的房子装修好之后可以租出去之类的；
4. NPC互动：除了任务剧情，基本上没有什么NPC互动，可以增加一些比如培养好感，支线剧情，解锁新家具之类的；
5. 宠物：游戏里有各种可爱的猫猫狗狗，但玩家自己却没办法养宠物？家门口的猫都撸了无数次了，然后还只是个家门口的野猫；

游戏整体是不错的，但我感觉更像是一个Demo，可能游戏的重点在于想让玩家通过帮不同的人布置房间，通过不同的物件，了解他们的故事，但我感觉这游戏完全可以有发展成星露谷那种游戏的潜力，还是希望之后能出更多的内容和游戏玩法吧

Очень хорошо, но мало :( Прошла игру за два вечера и очень бы хотелось, чтоб она не заканчивалась. 

Из плюсов - очень приятная стилистика, музыка, огромное количество мебели, цветочков, котиков, самых маленьких деталей интерьера. 
В игре отлично смотрятся нотка мистики и расследований, небольшие головоломки супер вписываются сюда. Не до всех вещей додумаешься сам, но большинство интуитивно накликаешь. Отсутствие перевода на русский язык совершенно не мешает, некоторые моменты можно перевести через экранный переводчик.
Есть несколько домов для обустройства, большой простор для фантазии. 

Из минусов - очень короткая. Хотелось бы больше контента и больше сюжета за эти деньги. Прошла игру и собрала все достижения за 9 часов :( 

Игра 7/10, к прохождению рекомендую

It's everything I wanted out of Sims 4, taking away the parts I hated. 

I can decorate my house and other spaces, organize items (such a stim for me), character interactions are minimal but not flat (which I like), town is charming, map is easy to traverse (I laughed when a car pingponged away from me), no health or food meters to attend, just adorable pixel art. 

Some minor bugs encountered, but devs are actively working on them! Nothing that'll stop me from playing. Haven't finished yet - there's a surprising amount of content in this game! Lots of enjoyable puzzles and secrets. I was not expecting much going in since most games like this are cash grabs, but not this one!

There's clearly a lot of effort, time, and talent that went into the game! Highly recommend!

I can easily see myself playing for hours, designing rooms with different themes. I love the quests and how I can freely roam around town! Right-clicking the anomalies is also so satisfying.

There’s always something cozy about pixel games paired with the right music. I think it’s fairly priced for what you get and definitely deserves the overwhelmingly positive reviews.

That said, I do wish there was more content to explore, and it would be amazing if we could have pets in our houses. On the bright side, the fact that you can pet cats is such a wholesome touch — it instantly won me over.

Have you ever wanted to move to a mysterious town to become a housekeeper, interior designer, and paranormal investigator all at once? Well boy do I have the game for you! Whisper of the House drops you into a cute and vibrant little town, where the townspeople will pay you to clean, organize, and design homes and businesses. But you start to encounter some... weird objects, not to mention the anonymous and vaguely threatening letters you start receiving in the mail. 

Oh, and you can pet cats!

The gameplay primarily consists of completing jobs for the townspeople (which progresses the story), fixing "anomalies," decorating your own homes (you start with one, and acquire 2 more throughout the game), and taking "model home" requests. There are also a few minigames -- making potions, mixing drinks, and growing unique plants (which you can then use to decorate with). Finally, you can wander around the town, which is just so cute and cozy!! It's rewarding to explore, because there are anomalies and secrets hidden around town, and sometimes you'll also run into characters you've helped previously. You can also raid crates and trash cans to find items, and you can find tokens scattered around.

The decorating mechanics are super simple and satisfying! Everything you pick up/set down makes a little sound that relates to what it is, which I love. The organization and decorating are VERY reminiscent of unpacking (another game I love, and probably a majority of Whisper players also love, LOL) but Whisper is more focused on the aesthetic/creativity aspect than the organization aspect (for example, there are a lot less drawers/cabinets to organize things in; there are a few, but mostly items are placed where they're visible). You can layer certain objects and even cause some objects to interact with each other (such as the ice cream cones and ice cream maker) to create new ones. 

Different jobs require different things from you as the housekeeper -- some are more focused on cleaning, some require you to place items in specific spots, and some simply ask you to decorate as you see fit. One of the cool things about this game is the variety of places you get to work on -- not only homes and apartments, but also different businesses, and even a cemetery. 

There is a huge variety of items, some of which make up themed sets. Furniture, appliances, decor, print items, plants, rugs, and food/drink can all be bought at different stores and vending machines around town, which are marked on the map. They're acquired through a blind box/gacha mechanic, but it's really easy to get tokens, so it's not stressful or difficult to unlock all the items. You'll be paid tokens after each job, when you're "promoted" by the company, and after completing model home requests. 

At the mall, you can buy duplicates of any furniture you have unlocked. For food and drink, you can buy duplicates at the convenience stores, and for plants, at the Flower Shop. I spent SO MUCH time just decorating and making spaces look cute and cozy, I'm sure I could have finished the game faster but I was having so much fun. There are no time penalties or deadlines, so I suggest taking it at whatever pace you want! 

Throughout the game, you get to know some really fun characters and help them with more than just organizing their homes. The little character stories are actually really heartwarming and adorable! Make sure to return to the homes and businesses you worked on, because some of the characters have secondary requests. I thought I was stuck for a while because no more requests were triggering, but I still had a missing character and anomalies... turns out I didn't know how to trigger one of the character's secondary requests. 

Overall, the game is pretty straightforward, and you can get most of the achievements and find most of the anomalies as long as you thoroughly explore and investigate everything. I got around 80/89 achievements by myself, and used a guide for the rest. There are a few things that are a little convoluted, the worst one (in my opinion) being the issue I mentioned before about triggering a characters request. Quick spoilers ahead in the following paragraph:

/BEGIN SPOILERS/

I got stuck after having completed all but one of the jobs in town, because I didn't know how to trigger Luna's secondary request. I had found the secret room and even interacted with the mousetrap, but when I returned to talk to her in response to her letter, I didn't get the hint about what I was supposed to do. She says something like "I hear sobbing at night, and noises in the bathroom." Ok, so I thought, I need to go check the secret room again as well as the bathroom. I click around, nothing happens. What you're meant to do is take the mousetrap from the secret room, put it in the bathroom, then wait a day and you'll receive a Daily Whisper about a homeless person being found in her apartment, as well as a letter from her asking you to come help her again (her secondary request). Honestly I don't get how you're expected to figure that out, the mousetrap is just one of many random cluttered items in the secret room and she makes no mention of rats or animals of any kind, just "noises" and "sobbing." I think if she had said something like "I wonder if there are animals?" after mentioning the noises, it might have clicked? I dunno if this is just me but that was frustrating because you're meant to finish that quest line early in the game, but I didn't get to it until near the end when I finally looked at a guide.

/END SPOILERS/ 

Besides my issue with Luna's requests, I only have small complaints about the game. Honestly, it instantly became one of my favorites -- it's just basically everything I love in one game. But here are my small criticisms, and some requests:

-All items should be able to be rotated all 4 ways. Certain items in the game can only be rotated 2 ways. Also, sometimes items that normally CAN be rotated 4 ways become locked into 2-way rotation when they're stacked (ex. a TV on top of a TV stand: both items by themselves can normally rotate 4 ways, but when stacked, they can't. If you un-stack them, rotate them to the position you want, then stack them again, it works). 
-Please add a search function for the storage! The filters are sometimes helpful, but sometimes not so much. Especially once you have all the items, finding a specific one can be very tedious. I think the best solution would be the option to search items by name. Being able to narrow down into smaller categories would also be good (ex. "bedframes," "computers")
-This one is probably a long shot, and it's not so much a criticism as just a request for future development. I would looveeee character customization! Doesn't have to be crazy or anything, but a few hair styles/colors and different outfits would be amazing. It made me sad looking at the cute clothes and wigs used as decor items in the game and wishing my character could wear them T_T
-Also perchance a long shot but... pets? Cats are a pretty big part of the game, and there's already the coding allowing us to pet the ones in town, plus lots of pet-related decor items. I would love it if we could take in a cat (or dog) that could either just sit or walk around one of our houses (and could be pet of course). 
-And finally... please more content!!! Pretty please a sequel or DLC or something. I want more jobs and more Whisper Town lore!!! No pressure, I know it takes time and effort but I hope there will be more eventually! <3

Hab das Game durch Zufall am Releasetag entdeckt und in 14 sehr intensiven Spielstunden durchgespielt. Ich bin mir aber sicher, dass noch weitere Stunden folgen werden, denn nach Beenden der Story gibt es noch genug zu tun ♡ 

Ich habe lange nach ähnlichen Spielen wie Unpacking gesucht und bin hier rundum abgeholt worden. Ich hatte gar nicht damit gerechnet überhaupt eine "übergreifende" Story zu bekommen und war schon beim ersten Auftrag positiv überrascht (und auch ein bisschen verunsichert, ob es irgendwo ne Horror Genre Einordnung gab, die ich übersehen hatte...xD bin ängstlich, okay?). 
Anyway war ich tapfer und habe mich auch durch fragwürdige Möbelverteilung (was macht die Kamera da?!) nicht aufhalten lassen und Auftrag um Auftrag erledigt. Es wurde nie eintönig und bis ganz zum Schluss habe ich gehofft, dass es jetzt noch irgendwie weiter geht, weitere Stadtareale betretbar werden und ich das Gefühl bekomme die Story ist irgendwie "abgeschlossen".

Ich hoffe, dass wir in Zukunft noch das ein oder andere DLC sehen werden - ich habe das Gefühl die Geschichte rund um Whispertown ist noch nicht auserzählt. 

Alles in allem: große Empfehlung für alle, die Unpacking mochten und nicht nur gerne Pixelräume einrichten, sondern sich von einer cozy-spooky Story überraschen lassen möchten :3

I played the demo and it was enough for me to want to purchase the full game. As many have said, if you liked Unpacking, you'll most probably like Whisper of the House, too. 

However, the game still feels a bit unpolished. The menu isn't as intuitive as it should be, and some effects feel like they should be softer, like sleeping (you click on sleep, and it's literally only a second or two of animation and the night has passed). So, some things feel slightly rushed and clunky. There are also several lines that aren't translated in English. 

If you're willing to overlook these small details, then I'm sure you'll enjoy playing Whisper of the House.

Highly recommended for anyone who enjoys cozy home-decorating games with adorable pixel art. Arranging the furniture is super fun and relaxing, and the story is surprisingly engaging—with little unexpected twists that keep things exciting in a lighthearted way. Honestly, I just wish the game were longer, because I managed to finish the main storyline in only 2–3 days.

The only downside is that since it’s a brand-new release, there are still quite a few minor bugs, and the user interface can feel a bit clunky. For example, there’s no clear category system for furniture or decorations within the same collection. Still, none of these issues really get in the way of enjoying the story or collecting achievements.

休闲解压游戏，核心玩法是搞装修收纳，接受来自小镇的委托，帮客户整理出一个非常好看又温馨的房间新布局，然后享受来自客户的赞美以及报酬。
右上角是房间整体需要整理的区域，所有区域都完成100%时，玩家就可以接受客户的审视，完成很好就可以获取点报酬。每个区域涉及的物件都在机器人里面，点击一下就可以拿出来，然后放在你觉得应该放置的位置，卧室。走廊。客厅、厨房。卫生间等等，每个房子布局都不太一样，因地制宜，根据各种房间的使用功能然后安排怎么给它摆放物件。

除了日常房子搬家，还有一些工作室和小作坊的也需要搬迁，有音乐室、烘培店等，甚至还有炼金攻防的打扫。对于摆放是没有任何强制要求，虽然小标签里客户对于一些物品摆放有要求，但最终收房时是不介意乱摆的。

另外收纳整理时觉得烦躁也可以外出小镇散散心，小镇规模还不小，包含了住宅区商业区公园等现实非常常见的建筑，游戏统统打包进来让你逛街逛个够，逛街放松时会遇见一些灵异现象，还有一些破损的地方，比如漏水的消防栓、地方垃圾一群，还能捡钱。

主线是非常轻松推进，收纳时会发现未知的秘密，想要探寻整个小镇的各种密码还是下个功夫。

打完主线，很放松的一个小游戏 。和 unpacking 有点像 ，这类归集收纳的小游戏特别适合在需要放松的时间打一打，能有一个非常享受的下午 。

就是 50+ 的定价对比大概只有 4 小时的主线内容来说定价还是略贵了 ，还是希望多更新一些内容，如果能开放创意工坊就更舒服了 。

可愛い見た目とまったりした雰囲気に惹かれて10％OFFで購入。

【良いところ】
・日本語翻訳されている。
・単純操作。
・音楽がゆるい。まったり出来てgood.
・ドッド絵がとても可愛らしい。
・世界観が穏やか。
・適度にミステリ？　SF要素あって、ワクワクする。
　なかなかその謎の先まで行かない感じもいい。
・想像以上にマップが広い。
・インテリアや家具の種類が多い。
・いろんなタスクがある。
　自宅を整えてゆくだけでなく、
　住民のオーダーに合わせて掃除や引っ越しのお手伝い等、
　飽きさせない工夫がある。
・私が一番いいと思った点なのだが、型に填めたようなインテリア設置はなく、
　（そういうタスクもあるにはあるが）
　基本的にはプレイヤーが思うようにインテリア設置を楽しめるところ。
・ガチャ要素で入手できるインテリアの数々。
　低額設定なのでそんなにストレスにはならない。
　（課金要素ではないので安心して回せる）


【駄目なところ】
・バグがあって進めなくなるところがある。
　（フィードバックで対応も早いが、やはり我に返る瞬間があるのは冷める一因にはなる）
・結構進んだと思うのだが、一向に自宅を改築or引っ越しができず、
　手に入れたインテリア類を飾るにも限度があって、モヤッとする。
・UIが多少不便。
・たまに翻訳抜けがある。

まだ出来たてだから粗があるようにも思うけれど
PVを見てこの世界観に興味が持てた人には十分楽しめるゲームだと思う。
バグと翻訳抜けがあるが、フィードバックで対応も
早いと思うので、日常生活に追われて疲れ果てている方は
触れてみるのも悪くはないかも。
私は十分楽しめてます。

Very charming and relaxing game. Kind of like Unpacking on crack with a sprinkle of House Flipper. There's an insane amount of pixel art assets that can be used to decorate (in total 1k? maybe more?). Many assets are also rotatable or even interactive. The story is surprisingly neat, but it does feel like there could be more. The main story is short and can be completed in 6-7h (more if you take your time), but the game also offers a somewhat open ended game loop -- it's possible to decorate (empty) rooms with assets (based on a random topic) but this only holds as far as one's creativity goes.

I love this game, absolutely obsessed. I hope they add more to the story (I binge play games). I definitely think this money was well spent and I would love to experience it again for the first time. :D

Great for anyone who played the game "Unpacking" or if you like unpacking/organizing/decorating games. There's also a story within the game which makes it all the more fun as you're playing - makes you keep wanting to find clues/secrets to unlock the rest of the story or learn more.

These developers took a concept of games like Unpacking and made it into something super special! My only issue with it is I know I'll want to drop 200+ hours on it and I feel like I'll be done with a majority of the content soon. Seriously worth it! Open world, customizable, great story, plenty of achievements, hidden lore, and literally hundreds if not 1,000+ items. It has everything you could want in a cozy game. 

I would love to see more updates and content, and if I'm lucky some character customization. I will be spreading the word, thank you for all your hard work, developers!

This game is a cosy dream come true! One of the best parts in cosy games is decorating your home and this takes that and multiplies it to a town! This game takes organising, cleaning, decorating, and uncovering a mystery and wraps it up in one beautifully illustrated adventure. The pixel vibes are perfect for the gameplay, and you can spend hours getting lost in all the different homes and rooms you can make. 

The only con is that the game is short. I would love a few more homes and missions to make the story feel more complete, but I would say that's a compliment to how enjoyable the game is.

Very charming, but a bit short! I beat the story in about nine hours, without really making much effort to rush it. I enjoyed the little mystery you're introduced to early on, and there are several fun little puzzles within the game that I liked taking the time to figure out. You can also pet the cats you find! 

Home design is a big part of the game, of course, so if you enjoy just designing rooms and collecting all the furniture pieces, you'll probably get a lot more hours out of the games. I also like that you can go back and re-design rooms you have worked on before- if you get more furniture you like and want to redecorate showrooms, you can. You also get a few properties of your own which you can mostly decorate as you'd like- however one home seems to have the wallpaper and tiling locked, meaning you'll need to theme the room around it. 

Overall, I didn't face any bugs and I had fun playing the game. If I could add suggestions for improvements- some of the missions within the showrooms ended up being the same, just in different rooms. For example, I did a mission to design a room for watching movies twice, just in separate spaces. For the small amount of quests actually available, it was disappointing to do the same thing twice. I would also love to see more showroom quests, or more buildings/jobs following the game that are just meant to be decorated.

That and I wish we could engage with the NPC's more. Aside from that I really enjoyed this game and I'm looking forward to completing it

街の住民からお掃除やリフォームの依頼を受けたりモデルハウスのデザインのお仕事をするハウジングゲーム

○良いところ
・ピクセルアートのグラフィックが可愛い
家具の一つ一つや街のオブジェクトまで何もかもが可愛くて癒される。
・依頼に期限や順番がない
スケジュールに追われることなく、思う存分ハウジングに没頭できる。
・個性豊かな依頼人
ストーリーのみならず依頼人の所持品からも個性が見えてくる。
例えば犬好きの依頼人から引越しの荷解きの依頼を受けると、犬以外にもガーデニングやゲームも好きなことが分かったりして楽しい。

○人を選ぶかもしれないところ
・若干のホラー的な要素
ストアページやデモ版の範疇では見受けられなかったが、少しだけヒエっとなる瞬間がある。
そこまで怖くもなく基本的にはまったりとプレイできるが、苦手な方は念のため心構えを。

昔MMOのハウジングにどハマりしていたのでゲーム性がすごく刺さりました。
日頃から癒しを欲している方には文句なしにおすすめできます。

真的很好玩

玩的很爽。搬家+微恐+解密（其实不算多），加上画风和音乐支持，体验非常舒服。就是体量比较小，基本主线过完只需要四小时，全部收集+一些额外房屋也就八小时左右。家具量还不错，有配套家具和散套家具两种。希望可以更新更多主线或dlc。
还可以优化的小细节大概有这些：
1.在家具分类上不够细致，经常难以找到某样物品。
2.拍照界面鼠标还是能在家具上留下金色或白色的选中轮廓，在点击拍照的时候会留痕迹这点有点不太好。
3.换色方面做得不错，但可以在可换色的家具上添加角标提醒，就不用一个个试过去。其次在一个家具换色时转动物品，可能有些视角没能换色成功。比如一个摇椅，原色是棕色，我换成了灰色后旋转到两个背面却还是棕色的。但目前只遇到了这一个家具是这样。应该是小bug。
4.在镇上探索时有鼠标移动+交互和键盘移动+交互两种。鼠标的交互经常点不到，键盘交互却没这个问题。
5.希望可以增加更多可以放置物品的家具。比如一些座椅上可以放叠好的衣服什么的，比较符合现实。
其他倒没什么，祝游戏越来越好

i would recommend this game, but i do have complicated feelings about it. 
this game is incredibly charming and reeaallyyy fun. the unpacking mechanics are so nice and having the different levels makes it really enjoyable and unique. I am so captivated by the tiny glimpses of story you get with each level, but at the same time I feel confused talking to npcs. Each narrative is so random and kind of half baked, it makes me want more but they're so short lived and inconclusive that it leaves me feeling pretty dissatisfied. This game is kind of mysterious, which I like, but the 15 levels available don't feel like enough to me. You kind of get thrown all of these levels, and then everything comes to a stand still. I walked around the town for half an hour trying to figure out what I was missing. 
I just think for a game that is so interesting at it's core, it needs a more structured playing experience.

至于怎么评价很纠结，我是从第一个宣传pv到第一个试玩demo入坑的，一开始是黑深残的剧情吸引了我然后加了愿望单，但是不知道是什么原因剧情大改（为了过审拿版号？），很失望。如果是被最初的试玩demo吸引想要买的话，我只能说现在在剧情体验上完全是两个游戏了，说实话价格不算便宜，还是劝慎重考虑。
但是只因为这个原因说不好玩还是失之偏颇，现在的剧情整体轻松带点感人要素（谁能不爱小猫咪呢），对于喜欢收纳、解谜和收集要素的玩家来说还是挺推荐的，像素画风也很可爱w。
這佈置+解謎的小品遊戲, 真好玩

挺好的，但是对于首发价格来说内容还是有些少。
希望有更多家具和房型
希望继续更新越来越好❤
赛博大扫除，玩起来还是挺解压的，适合强迫症和完美主义者游玩。
非常有趣，像素画面也相当的精致，装修整理游戏搭配些微恐怖和悬疑这个组合非常吸引人！唯一的缺点是对比价格流程实在太短了.....希望制作组能继续更新或者DLC出新地图，不要浪费了这么好的企划！

现在这个体量觉得太少了，希望制作组早日开发新内容吧。
优点是画风精致/强迫症一本满足/装修模拟爱好者狂喜
缺点是：
①任务引导不够清晰，隐藏任务似是而非。
②仓库管理混乱不明晰，找东西很困难。
③操作有待优化，例如TAB键分层放置、带东西去其他房间只能一次一个等等。
④抽箱到了后期真的折磨，建议要么就个跳过选项，要么就20抽或者30抽，每次10抽还有个动画真的又臭又长。
Wow, Unpacking but with actual content
很优秀的作品，终于get到了休闲游戏的乐趣
好玩

挺好的一款游戏，像素版的搬家整理小游戏。
有很多细节家具都能交互，还蛮有趣的
但是结束的有点太突兀了，我都没反应过来是玩完了，还以为是哪里没做完出了bug。结果是博物馆都满收藏了也没有后续。说到博物馆，这方面好像也没有后续？清零没有，全收集也没有剧情，只是一味的跳成就。
家具检索方面希望能优化一下，现在的分类还是太大了，希望能有桌子 椅子 床这类更细致的分类。
我不知道是不是因为我没玩完？但是我确实没找到后续的剧情。目前最大的问题还是感觉戛然而止了，小镇上的神秘力量到底是什么也不清楚，有没有解决办法也不知道，而且镇上的人也都淡淡的没什么交互，希望能后续优化一下吧

2025年玩的最有趣的游戏，收拾家的玩法再加上像素风特别治愈！
5小时通关，看了看攻略6小时全成就。
希望后续可以出新的dlc。
游戏很好，但是体量太小，内容有点少，我博物馆解锁42时我都没想到通了，我以为会开新的地图，下方足球场那部分

纠结了一下点了不推荐（确实劝朋友不要原价买了，打折30以下再入
玩的时候感觉还行，玩完觉得不值

一个是流程太短，这个游戏我玩过Demo，当时玩的时候还很喜欢的，也推荐给朋友过。结果等这么久一晚上就玩完了，一脸懵逼，除去挂机可能就玩了6个小时的样子。
二个是去掉了恐怖因素。第一次看这个游戏是微信公众号或者微博刷到的，恐怖+装修+像素马上就引起了我的兴趣，后面上demo也下载玩了，通过装修来改变雇主的命运还是蛮有趣的。这次发售第一天就买来玩了（其实大和40+的价格我有犹豫过但最近正好游戏荒，结果玩完就后悔买太早了 = =  第一个单子的变态房东被改成了流浪汉，之后除了小鱼的幻想和墓地塔楼，已经感觉不到恐怖元素，而且除了demo的房东和爷爷，全流程也就一个魔法师让我感到装修后的影响，除此之外就是普通的装修游戏= =  记者线也有种没有做完的感觉
三个装修体验并不是特别好，家具分类有点差，也没有排序什么的，就TAB键改变层级这一点算做得好吧。最后送的那个大house，一件件拿那么——多家具累死我，直接没拿完.....抽盲盒也没啥必要，反正钱已经全部给我了而且能抽完，为什么我要10个10个地抽呢？增加我在线时长吗？

我觉得巨好玩！甚至比unpack还好玩！做得好用心！
能互动的家具好多！家具主题也很实用！各种小彩蛋！地图探索也不错！而且堆叠和填充都很合理，比一般同类游戏做的都好！（比如不会说柜子里面的盲区就放不了东西），甚至还可以几个货架连一起放一个更长的东西！
就是主线太短了，玩一点少一点很有压力！（其实任务挺多的，但我太心急了根本忍不了一点！）
出DLC必入！求求了别休息了快干活！

推薦推薦

劇情很棒，每個居民都有屬於自己的故事
雖然刪了demo版寫的微恐劇情有點可惜，但整體來說還是很讚
關卡裡的小物品幾乎都標註了信息，值得停下來細品每一個文字

據官方說有1800的家具，每個家具能變換角度，部分還設計了背面
劇情完結後能接小委託自由設計房子，不會因為完結了就不打開遊戲了

這價格說實話不貴，遊玩過程中感受到滿滿的用心
心中喜歡的家政類遊戲絕對榜上有名
期待更新，後續推出DLC也一定支持
快多更新点打扫委托

事实再一次证明，我只是喜欢收拾别人家。
能收拾出别人的小秘密就更好了。
有意思的，既能满足喜欢玩装修的玩家，还有一些魔法悬疑要素的小剧情和解密，画风也好看
喜欢unpacking的可不能错过这一款游戏 尽管主线的流程有点短 地图也有点小 但是在布置摆放过程中的小细节 以及轻微克苏鲁元素这些画龙点睛的存在 不会让我感到枯燥烦闷
发售第一时间就买了，玩完的感想：快点出后续！dlc！花钱都可以！家具摩多摩多！还有自家的房间装修版型太少了！！
希望之后还可以再更新一些任务房
好治愈的游戏,让人稍微没有那么浮躁了，虽然后期有一种无指引混乱的感觉，但是也不影响喜欢，望常更新~

散らかった部屋を片付けたり、店長の指示通りにお店を作り上げたりするお部屋作りゲーム。
お店タイプの依頼だと指定が多いですが、基本的にはある物を自由に置いてね系の依頼が多いです。

自宅用のアイテム解放はガチャですが、未解禁の物が出やすい仕様＋解禁済の物を購入できるお店があるので、思ったよりは楽でした。
ドット絵で表現された家具がものすごくかわいいし、
インタラクトすると動く家具も色々あって、かなり楽しい要素だと思いました。

謎解き要素は近くにヒントがあることが多いので、そこまで難しいとは感じませんでした。
ホラー要素はほんの少しあるので、絶対無理な人は避けたほうがいいと思います。
(自分もホラーが苦手ですが、怖い要素を承知の上で遊んでみたら平気でした)

キャラクターの一人称がぶれていたり、アイテム説明の人名部分が中国語だったり、翻訳面は微妙ですが、
かわいいドット絵のゲームやお部屋作りゲームに興味がある人にはおすすめです！
特别喜欢这个游戏，轻松解压，非常推荐！

建议和疑问？
1、希望增加视角旋转，如果是我操作得不对，请告诉我怎么旋转整个屋子的视角，感谢~
2、有时候机器人会挡到一些家具，同时最好增加机器人的移动，我理解有了视角旋转就不需要增加机器人移动了
做得很精致，但是流程实在是太短了，这么大一个镇子只开了几个房间任务，希望尽快更新……
Good, cozy game
非常非常好的游戏，比之前看视频预想的还要惊喜

Love this little cozy game. 13 hours of play and 100% achievement completion. I don't manage to do that with many games, but this one kept me wanting to do and explore more. The art style is lovely, and surprisingly detailed for a pixel based style. Music is pretty nice too. :)
好玩！是我喜欢的类型
很有趣！！特别是在寻常的家居游戏里加入一些诡异神秘的元素，相得益彰，很喜欢~而且这个精致的像素风让我想起以前的口袋妖怪宝石系列，呜呜真的好怀念以前的口袋，也不是说啥都必须做成3D吧，唉

部屋片付けorコーディネートのゲーム。
そこは難易度が低く、単純に楽しめました。
ある程度進むとコーディネートのみになるようです。片付けももっとやりたかったかな～。
でも金額相応なボリュームかと思いますし、良かったです。

謎解きの部分はヒントがあまり無くて「あれ、ストーリー進まなくなった？」と戸惑いが。
実績がヒントになっていたので、最後は実績解除を目指して遊びました。
これはこれで楽しい。

Steam always teases me with their cool 8 bit sales banners and event/holiday, thinking the banner is form a game they are featuring in the sales. this game has more than satisfied that want for cozy little 8 bit play along with a dopamine chaser around ever turn.

This is a very cute and cozy. If you like Unpacking then I highly recommend this game! I have been having so much fun and it is so easy to move around, clean and decorate. There are so many cute items and I'm having a lot of find finding all the little hidden secrets. I can't wait to see what future updates or DLC bring to this game!
So very fun and cozy
I like the game very cozy, however in between the move somehow it makes me a bit nausea, could be just me. Oh it is the rapid move to show where the new location is.
Loved it 10/10 i hope more content gets added
好玩捏！
从出demo开始就关注了这款游戏，因为在steam上同类型游戏较少，所以一直非常期待。正式版虽然目前还没有走完全流程，不过因为实在不懂为啥一款装修类的游戏要设计一个关卡是将所有东西放置到指定位置，所以还是忍不住来评论了，在这关中完全体验不到游戏的乐趣仅有不停电点击鼠标的枯燥。也许是因为同类型游戏比较少，期待较高所以有些恨铁不成钢吧，还是希望游戏能够越做越好。

Like Unpacking but more! The story is really cute but I think it’s too short for the price. 

The graphics, gameplay are cozy and warm and can take you hours on end to just decorate but it’s very repetitive in terms of “room decorating” and you don’t have to do much to get the full vouchers. 

I like this game a lot don’t get me wrong. It itched the decorating part and interactive part that animal crossing: happy home lacked. 

The gameplay is creative and fun but the story was just way too short for my taste. I didn’t even realize I was done until I saw there wasn’t much abnormalities left on the museum. 

I would recommend this when it’s more on sale because the story only had taken me roughly 10 hours in the expand of 2 days to finish. 

If you adore decorating, cozy and small interactions within a game- I do recommend you try this game!
玩着有惊喜。

At its core its obviously heavily inspired by "unpacking". but it offers a much more varieties of gameplay, some levels can be finished with your brain completely shut down, but some require certain level of creativity.
Frankly speaking i was just expecting a overpriced unpacking clone, but turn out its a evolved version with lot of contents, what a surprise!
好玩
真正意义上的轻松休闲，房间收纳+轻度解密，还设计了丰富的收集元素，收集过程都是一段治愈的故事。唯一就是游戏10个小时就通关了，舍不得我的别野！！

总体剧情流程有点短，也没有试玩的时候掉san，期待一下dlc

画风和装修方式都是我特别喜欢的，装修装得非常爽，翻垃圾桶也翻得很爽（。不知道后续还会增加家具吗

总之还是非常推荐的
suki啊suki 摩多摩多！爽——
Loved!

3/10
画风很可爱。我喜欢收纳和装修房子，但这游戏的主要内容只有收纳和装修房子，以及寻找各种各样的隐藏和成就。内容少，也没有什么驱动力，发现了密室甚至就只是发现了，然后又回去装房子，好像发现这些东西是什么平平无奇的日常生活一样，感觉很怪。
发现了新东西也不能毛客户家的家具，也不能把客户家乱七八糟的东西换成钱，没有什么达成感。
交互感很强，不断有新的惊喜和小谜题，在搬家这项重复性很高的模式里做了许多有趣的创新，让人能一直保持兴趣，不会觉得无聊。大地图捡垃圾系统很适合我这种赶路都觉得无聊的adhd
Best game to come since unpacking. Very cute and fun moving sim.

膨大な数の家具や雑貨を好きに配置できる良作ハウジングゲーム。
家具にインタラクトしたり一部の家具を組み合わせると何かが起きる等のギミックもあり、面白いです。
メインシナリオは薄味かつボリューム少な目ですが、模様替えゲームが好きな人なら楽しく遊べるかと。
模様替えパートが良く出来ていて面白いだけに、お話しの短さが残念ではあったかも。
재미있음 하지만 가끔씩 나오는 중국어에  번역도 됐으면 좋겠다 싶음
GOOD

Tipo Unpacking com mistérios e com uma cidade imensa e menos narrativa pessoal e mais narrativas fantasiosas (e divertidas). Muito prazeroso e fofinho. Amei montar minha casinha e colecionar um monte de objetos fofinhos e organizar todos os outros ambientes. NÃO BAIXAR se você não tiver tempo para ficar viciadinho. Você foi avisado...

Cute and cozy. It's like Unpacking meets Animal Crossing Happy Home Designer/Paradise. I did not play the demo, but I had this game wishlisted for a long time and it has exceeded my expectations. There are lots of secrets, optional puzzles, areas to explore, and I don't feel constrained to only do quests. I think I only ran into 1 bug the entire time I've played which is the search feature not working correctly for storage, but it's been reported (and there is a workaround). The devs also already put out a patch for the game at launch.

I highly recommend this game!

My only qualm:
- Home designs can feel limited due to lack of matching item sets, lack of color customizing of some items/walls/floors (some can be customized, but not all) but that's really it. 

I'd be so excited if the devs continued to update the game and add more features, items, quests, etc. but it really does feel "complete".
This game is a delight.

If Unpacked and the ACNH DLC had a baby this game would be it! There is such an amazing attention to detail that makes the world feel so alive, and all of the items have such an incredible amount of love and personality poured into them. I adore the fun puzzles that are sprinkled throughout the game, each one completely different from the next. Although there are many games this one can be compared to, it truly is unique and spectacular in its own right. I can't wait to see more people enjoy this game as much as I have!

I played the demo for this, I can honestly say I loved it then and still do now, having thoroughly enjoyed it. It's cute and cozy, and there's plenty to do and explore. Every character was unique and their story's easy to follow. Both the team and community were quick to communicate when any questions or bugs arose, which made for an even better experience. ♥
喜欢喜欢

Super super recommend! Unpacking, house flipper, camper van, all these cozy games in one unique package with intriguing characters and events. As well as wayyy more bang for your buck. If this game cost more, I would have paid more no question. 
I think at 2 hours I've done 4 houses, sorted through A LOT of garbage and pet at least 3 cats, if you want like an actual content review.
好玩 希望有更多劇情
I LOVE this game
If you are considering buying this game I highly recommend it!! Very relaxing and if you like designing and cozy games- this is for you!! ALSO the game has a lot of cool achievements!!
Juego god

I'm going to give this game a recommended because it is enjoyable, the art style is very charming, the lil spooky story is very interesting. But the game does feel a little half baked for a full release. There aren't very many locations to decorate, 15 at most which I feel is a very small amount for a full released game. I'm unsure of the developers plans for continued updates but I feel the game is missing a lot of content. There's so much potential here so I hope they continue support as this was a delightful little experience!

At least 9-10 hours of fun house decorating, item collecting, and mystery solving! There's many secrets and achievements as well as extra rooms to decorate after the main story. I love the aesthetic of the game and all the cute furniture. Also you can pet cat. 10/10

Had a blast playing this game. Really reminded me of the game Unpacking but 100% extra content and game play time. So much more to do. Super super fun. Had a great time trying to solve the mysterious town problems as well. My first play though I clocked 50 hours. So I def will play again to get the rest of the remaining achievements. Oh and the price is more than fair for all that you get to do. A lot of time and effort went into making this game. You can tell that instantly with all the variety of furniture they made, the town is large, tons!!!
cutest game ever

時には指定された通りに、時には自分の好きなように、時間制限なしでまったり遊べる家具配置ゲーム。

可愛いドット絵とインテリアゲームに惹かれて購入したが、メインのインテリア以外にもギミックが用意されていてそれが特に楽しい。
依頼された家に行き依頼内容に応じて家具配置していくが、それとは別に家の中に散りばめてあるヒントを頼りに解くギミックが用意されていてそれを解くことによって解除される実績もある。
親切にインタラクトも表示されるので分からなければ気になる個所を右クリしていけばOK。
ホラー要素は添えるだけ。ジャンプスケアなどビックリするシーンはない。

一部日本語訳が出来てない箇所はあるがプレイ自体に影響はなかった。
A bit short but a really great creative game.

有玩過demo版非常喜歡這種遊戲機制，有簡單的小故事，又能滿足整理控的慾望，出了正式版馬上買來玩玩看，真的太棒了👍👍
如果你也喜歡整理東西！強烈推薦給你😍他是精神時光屋。

Cozy and gimmicky little game with a lovely artstyle, a nice variety of items and quest. 

Perfect for a laid back session of gaming and/or if you are a fan of this type of game.

I love this game, counted down until the release date. played the demo too many times...is there really too many? nope. 

It seems like a small cozy creative organization or interior design game, but the more you do the more interactive it gets. Mysteries around every corner, characters you want to learn more about, stories that intrigue [spoiler] My favorite thing to do is visit the well...she is so cute! [/spoiler]

There are interactive items you come across making the world feel more alive and more immersive. With all of the different quests and items to collect I find it fully re-playable over and over. 

I highly recommend this game!!
Amazing

Милая игра с таинственным мирком. Очень понравилась своей уютной атмосферой и проработанностью миссий, в одной локации может быть так много секретов, этим и побуждает осматривать каждую деталь так ласково добавленную разработчиками (там можно гладить котиков). Можно выполнять поручения, а можно обустраивать свой дом, предметы для которого можно получать из гачи, но местной валюты хватит, чтобы получить все и не раз. ;3

全成就通关，总体来说很好玩！非常棒的整理类游戏，使我的时间消失！就是稍微有点短了，其实还挺喜欢看到各个人物的故事的，还有那么多楼都是空的呢，人口膨胀城市该扩建了，让我进去装修！！！一些小的改进建议：1.仓库分类太笼统了，实在不行可以按照刻板印象的家具分类来，这样即使我想把床摆在客厅，我也可以直接点卧室找到床，而不是在家具里面一直翻。2.物品的旋转有的可以四面八方有的就只能两面，我觉得能够统一一下最好。因为我很需要马桶背对着我【不是】主要是有时候旋转方向只有两个真的很影响装修的效果，这种游戏不能四面真的会很难受。不知道后续还有没有更新呀，总之先期待

if unpacking and twin peaks had a baby                                                                                                                                                                                                             and the baby was house flipper

很有趣的一个游戏，房间收纳+轻解谜结合的很好，发现隐藏房间/特殊物品时很有成就感（而且真的塞了超级多），目前有的关卡设计都还比较用心，类型也算丰富
截至目前（25.8.30）主要问题还是内容量略少和结尾稍有仓促，我稍微玩了一下装修、主要跑主线、顺手撸猫捡垃圾也就7小时全成就，以目前的关卡水平肯定是期待制作组能多做一些啦。结局反而有点疑惑，石碑上的内容和游戏体验似乎……比较平行，可能再完善一下会比较好
（另外调酒爱好者表示目前的酒柜库存能调的种类可比游戏内的多太多了，制作组真的不考虑多来几种顺带直饮/stir/shake分开吗！）

[h1]收纳东西真是休闲惬意啊 [/h1]
如果你玩过《Unpacking》或是对这种休闲类型游戏很感兴趣，那么《呓语小镇》一定非常适合你。

正如《Unpacking》本作也是一款收纳摆放物品的游戏，与之不同的是在本作中游戏不局限于一个一个的房间，而是放在一个各种设施齐全、人来人往，玩家可以自由探索的温馨小镇，而玩家将作为家政工帮助小镇居民搬家、整理、打扫各种各种的房子——面包房、炼金工房、酒吧等等。

并且游戏并不像前者一样会有“强迫症”式摆法，物品需要放在合理的位置。在本作中，玩家可以将物品随心所欲的摆放，打造出自己理想的样子，甚至想快速通关的玩家可以随便乱摆，但缺少了游戏收纳摆放后整整齐齐的乐趣。

而我们玩家在每次完成任务都会获得代金券，代金券用于在小镇上各处商贩那里随机抽奖获得家具，我们在探索小镇的时候也能从一些箱子里获得家具，它们用于装饰我们自己的房子。
[h2] 博物馆数字之谜 [/h2]
本作不仅仅只是帮助小镇居民整理归纳物品，游戏在每个物品上都会有一些“小细节”。玩家可以从一些便签、书纸上面了解一些剧情，其他物品还有对该物件的详细介绍。
这一点也是让人非常舒服，毕竟很多东西不介绍根本不知道是什么东西。

而游戏最有意思的地方在于游戏内包含的一些有趣的解密，比如前期在炼金术师的房子，根据配方魔法书制作正确的魔法药剂就能解开谜题找到失踪的炼金师。
而这种有意思的小设计在游戏中也不少，在游戏开始的时候就会报纸告诉玩家博物馆数字之谜，而这个数字就是对应着玩家所找到的“异常”，每找到一个数字就会减少一次。
这些“异常”往往也隐藏着部分秘密，比如最开始露娜房间里，有一个酷似蒙娜丽莎的画像后面，当玩家消除异常后就会出现一个神秘的密室，在只言片语中了解是一个流浪汉偷偷居住在此。
所以游戏这些设计增加了趣味性，避免只是重复摆放归纳带来的无聊感。
[h2] 总结 [/h2]
作为一款收纳类型游戏，游戏画面、音乐表现出色，在休闲的基础上加入解密要素，增加了游戏的趣味性，玩家也能从许多物品中挖掘更多有意思的小细节，如果你也喜欢这类游戏，那不妨来体验一下，亲自找到小镇的秘密。

终于找到我心目中的休闲游戏了！之前有段时间沉迷抖音里那种装修房子和收纳的游戏，但是被看广告弄的很烦，终于在PC上玩到类似的了。故事模式很喜欢，希望作者一直更新，强迫症和完美主义者太舒服了

What a wonderful game! This definitely scratched that Unpacking type itch for me, and bonus points for having a lot of leeway in placing items and not being forced into putting things in certain spots to proceed. It look me 8 hours to 100% achievements, though keep in mind there hadn't been any guides created yet when I was playing so that last hour was mostly hunting for the last few.

I think there are a couple improvements that could be made to the end and translations especially, if things were worded a bit better it would make things a lot more clearer to understand story-wise. But for me the gameplay is what I came for - and it very pleasantly exceeded my expectations.

I'm not completely done yet, but so far I have to say I am very impressed. It starts out cozy at first and the mystery element develops slowly, which isn't an issue for me personally, in fact I prefer it even. The actual tasks are all a little different from each other, sometimes you can design a room however you want, sometimes you just have to place objects in their designated spots or it's a mix of both, so the gameplay doesn't get boring. The rooms also each have their own little secrets and mechanics to discover. The gacha mechanic for items is a bit of a weird choice in my opinion, but also not really an issue since you can obtain more than enough currency. The town itself is very beautiful and atmospheric, especially at night, I love that you can pet the cats! <3 The only thing I'd like is some sort of character customization, but I'm not a developer myself and not sure if that would work out with the graphics, if you can even see significant changes on the character model. But still I can only recommend the game!

Update: I've played through the entire game and played some more after some new items were added and I still love it! The fact that you can now change layouts and have more of your own homes to design is great and what I had wished for after my playthrough. The game leaves you just naturally wanting more and I do hope they release DLC for this game or something, I'd definitely be the first to buy it! Though one thing that bugs me, is that you can change the wallpaper in the starter home, but not in the apartment with the balcony for some reason? Please fix that!

评价为还行6.5/10
1.主要玩法为装修，类似于unpacking。关卡不多就算了，有几关太过敷衍了，点名批评乐器店和花店，一个全部指定位置，一个指定家具位置以后硬塞十几二十盆花硬放。
2.附带一点点的跑地图捡垃圾玩法。这个部分比装修好玩，但内容更少了，只能玩几分钟。
3.装修的房间附带一些解密。本作最大的亮点，比较有意思。但是份量太少了，只有炼金房间最好玩，其他房间点几下就算解密了。
4.令人迷惑的盲盒。绝大部分家具都要通过盲盒抽取，抽卡又没有稀有度之类的设定，就硬抽，没有意义。
5.戛然而止的结局。收集42个异常就莫名通关，全收集也没额外剧情，打完以后非常空虚。

总结：核心缺点是内容太！少！了！！

Я в восторге! Хотелось поиграть во что-то как стардью, но от симуляторов ферм порядком устала. Здесь вам нужно заниматься оформлением интерьеров. Я за два часа игры оформила супермаркет, музыкальный магазин, пекарню, квартиру собачницы, пляжный домик, поискала котёнка в тц! Очень разнообразные задачи, у меня часто проблемы с выбором чего-то одного из сотни вариантов, здесь есть задания на оформление интерьера из всего вашего хранилища, но большая часть заданий -- помощь с вещами и мебелью заказчиков

Если вы любите пиксель-арт, вам стоит купить эту игру! Стооолько красиво нарисованных деталей интерьера, которые ещё и супер легко покупаются и дают вам творить -- это с ума сойти. 

Нравится мистический подтекст, нагнетающий атмосферу, нравится городок, заказчики. По каким-то их вещам создаётся полный портрет человека. Да, у девушки магазин-пекарня, булочки, хлеб, но в спальне всякое для мистических ритуалов, а её парень вообще давным давно пропал... 

Ещё отмечу саунд-дизайн, ставишь стол из стекла -- слышишь, что это стекло. Духовка приятно гудит, стиральная машина неприятно шумит, бумага шелестит. 

В общем, это чудо, не знаю к чему всё идёт, но однозначно пройду игру до конца. Не хватает русского перевода, у меня скудные навыки владения английским, некоторые нюансы перевожу через переводчик, но глобально это не ощущается как проблема

1.希望能引入更多主题的店铺（宠物店、服装店、电影院、健身房等等），毕竟是小镇嘛，地点最好能更丰富些
2.最好再多增加一些剧情流程，目前来看还是有很多埋下伏笔但没详细展开的地方[spoiler] 比如墓地里几位幽灵的身世，记者大智的监视，白老太太的发家史（？） [/spoiler] 留给人遐想的余地很多，但还是想制作组能再展现一些~
3.发现游戏内是存在气候系统的（下雨+下雪+晴天），但似乎对游戏本身没啥影响……如果后续能出一些季节限定的活动就更好了
4.家具分类最好再细一些，尤其是杂物类太多了，找东西很不方便；
5.Tab键切换层级时会遇到很不智能的情况（比如冰箱内）经常点半天放不进去

总体来讲是完全值回票价的，感觉就像花钱买了一大本拼贴贴纸，不仅有声音色彩互动，还能无限畅玩，最重要的是想修改直接无痛再捣鼓一份就行，实在非常爽~希望游戏能大卖！
整理癖必入，就是太短了
超级特别非常好玩！！！画风超可爱，故事也很有趣，可以看得出制作者很用心，重拾当年玩星露谷的那种上头的感觉了，随便玩一下三四个小时没了，好玩爱玩我要玩一辈子！！！！！！！！！！！！！

unpacking这个游戏的无限续杯，国产精品，很多地方都非常细节。比如说家具的文案显示，名字在左上角，而描述文案是家具上方的一行小字，只有家具放下来之后鼠标悬停在上面选中的时候才会显示，不会影响整体画面。还有可以拿着东西换房间，有多余的就装在箱子里拿走，精致的描边、放置时轻微的抖动和声效，这些交互都是粗制滥造的小程序收纳游戏做不到的，主线每个房子的户型也非常特别，不是从实用性出发而是在角色特点和画面整体效果上做了取舍，非常喜欢这个出发点，不管从哪个地方截图都很美观。可以说青出于蓝而胜于蓝了。（而且还比unpacking便宜）玩一个主线房间大概十五分钟，节奏拿捏得也很好。不过感觉街道上可以互动的东西有点单一了，都是捡垃圾打扫卫生什么的，最多就是抽家具，路人对话只有那几句，几乎等于没有，希望这方面可以丰富一下内容。

最大缺点是主线太少了，能不能再多更新点啊我什么都不会做的（）

I have been waiting for this game after playing the fun demo and it did not disappoint. I love love love the game so far and loving how you can collect so many different items to decorate your own place. I'm taking my time with this game to see all the little cool details and you can tell the game developers really took time to make it a fun, cozy game. The best part is the story of each task you get which really brings the game to life and gives it some character. If you loved playing Unpacking, you will love this so much more (and I'm not even done yet).
不愧是期待了这么久的游戏，就是流程有点短，期待后续
神神神！11h全 神作像素风 太好玩了有点爽 主线挺短慢慢认真玩大概8h差不多了 后期接单玩着有些枯燥重复 希望多加些剧情和物品丰富内容 多加点键盘快捷键 鼠标一直点着累

I was looking for a relaxing cosy game to play and this is everything I was looking for and more!
It's very cute and decorating all the houses can be very relaxing. But added to that there's some spooky stuff going on in this little town, giving some mystery vibes which adds a lot to the game play. I haven't played through the whole game yet but I'm excited to see where this goes!
特别精致的像素装修游戏！！喜欢装修的不容错过。可以帮人建房是特别好的，期待有更多的家具风格DLC，以及希望能把分类做得更完善一些，家具多了之后太难找了TT
终于发售了！超级棒！！！解压、可爱、上瘾、好玩！好喜欢炼金师房间的bgm 请就这样把整个世界都变成像素风吧 <3

今後アップデートやDLCなどでさらにストーリーが追加されることを願っています。

とても素敵な作品をありがとうございました。

很惊喜的质量，原本以为就是单纯的收纳小游戏，结果竟然还有轻度剧情和解密，都很有意思。那一丢丢的心理恐怖元素很喜欢！（甚至希望最后的规则怪谈可以实装成彩蛋，本来以为会有的结果竟然没有......）

It's like unpacking but with a little bit more depth! I thoroughly enjoy the designing and unpacking aspect, and so far I also really like the little storylines. There's so many hidden story elements to discover too. The only thing I would have loved is a little bit more depth to the characters you meet, but since it's not the main focus of the game either way, it isn't that bothersome. I think the game looks absolutely stunning, and I don't regret getting it! Price-wise it's also great for what you get!

There's cleaning mechanics, which I love and it's so satisfying. I love how it's open world so you can interact with things and get rewards for it. The animation and art is very adorable. I love how they added a little eeriness to the game which makes it suspenseful, I 10/10 recommend! ദ്ദി ˉ͈̀꒳ˉ͈́ )✧
（主线已经玩完了，离线游玩所以没有更新时长）对剧情非常失望……可以看出原本都是很好的想法，但由于种种原因最后只是匆匆拼凑就端上来了，导致每次到了感人的地方我都有种欲感还休的感觉= =……走近科学式的结局非常猝不及防，剧情的节奏也不佳，惋惜叹息可惜，但仍然是一个值得入手的游戏，真心喜欢这类游戏的大家首发多支持一下工作室来点经费改进一下后续更新吧……爱信等

Arts is spectacular, and gameplay is fun. 

Unfortunately no full controller support: 
- any text field requires keyboard
- scroll bars need to be clicked and dragged instead of scrolled with right stick
- inventory management with a controller is so slow and mind nubbing that eventually you give up on it.

The game could also use a UI scale option, as a lot of the text is tiny. Other bugs have been reported already, so hopefully these issues are fixed in the future.

Overall pretty good game, but a bit pricy for what you get.

So, I've rolled credits on the main story.  I gotta say, I did enjoy my time, though I feel there's more mystery than explanations.  Now, that, for the most part, is NOT a bad thing.  I don't need everything explained.  I liked that some puzzles were present without you realizing they were there.  [spoiler] Shout out to the alchemy puzzles and knowing Ian was missing and the page of instructions. [/spoiler].

Though others, I'm fairly sure there is something to do I'm just not sure where to look for the answers.  [spoiler] The runes you get in the graveyard have several of us stumped. [/spoiler].

I felt the music and sound were fine.  Music didn't overly stand out, in a good or bad way and the sounds were what you'd expect.

I'm a big fan of decorating/placing furniture and having some spookiness with that was rather fun.

The main story isn't a LONG game and I'ms sure you could speed run it if you felt like it (some jobs are longer than others, or easy to get away with little, mostly the bulletin board ones) so factor that in with your decide to purchase or not.

Like I said, I've rolled credits and there IS more to still do so I'm pretty satisfied.

因为夹杂了一些捡垃圾，没什么内容的关卡，实际满足搬家装饰元素的关卡大约也就12个，主线3-4个小时可以结束，定价48.6元真的有点昂贵！请更新新关卡！

This game is instantly addicting. Obviously inspired from Unpacking, but with a more interactive twist, world, & characters. However, it does have its quirks. 

The actual interface itself can be confusing and mildly frustrating. Sometimes you want to rotate something one other direction, but you can't. The customize / remodel tool that allows you to change furniture, walls, floor colors & styles is a major selling point I would love so much more if it worked better. 

If there's a way to change the colors on interactable kitchen counters... well I never found it. Things like the stove and sink just turn on when I try to customize, and who wants one or two pieces the wrong color? Not enough color options either. 

The UI is large, and disabling it is frustrating because it doesn't show you item names anymore, map to switch floors easier disapears, as well as storage and design tool. I need those up, everything else gone. 

However, the game is fun, addicting, and feels unique even though I've played similar games.
